She sells women's clothing at the local market. As she has a large experience in this area, she deals with the business with ease. However, in the beginning it was very difficult for her. Farogat gradually developed her business. 

Farogat would like to increase the working capital and attract more customers. Farogat requests a loan in the amount of 7,000 somoni for the purchase of women's clothing. She awaits your kindness and hopes for your charity.

loans.use: To purchase women clothing

loans.name: Gorret

texts.en:
Gorret is a single mother of four children,  three of whom go to school. She takes care of additional family (sister and mother). 

She has thr business of a restaurant and has been in this business for five years. She has applied for a  loan  of1,000,000 Uganda shillings from MCDT-SACCO  to buy more  cow peas, beef, Irish potatoes, and cooking oil. She works at the market seven days out of every week and sells on a retail basis. Her major business challenges include seasonality and defaulters. 

She aspires to owning a fully stocked restaurant and also to buy more a plot of land and start growing cow peas. She resides in the family house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees and feeding the family.

loans.use: To buy more cow peas, beef, irish potatoes, and cooking oil.

loans.name: Isagani

texts.en: Isagani, a father of three children, provides transportation services in their village while he helps his wife manage a direct selling business to make a living. Over four years, he has earned well to provide for the family.  He needs repairs and maintenance of his motorcycle to improve the services for his customers. This micro-finance loan helps Isagani with his business. In the future, he wants to acquire a new motorcycle to use for expansion of his services.

loans.use: to make repairs and do maintenance on his motorcycle

loans.name: Irene

texts.en:
Irene is a 36-year-old married woman with three children. She has two adult dependents. 

She makes an estimated monthly income of 20,000 KES selling clothes.  She has been in this business for four years and would like 30,000 KES to  buy bulk quantities of clothes to sell to clients in her area. 

She successfully repaid her previous loan. She will use her income to expand her current business.

loans.use: to purchase bulk quantities of clothes.

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en: Mary Jane has been  providing a motorcycle transportation service to make a living. In addition to this, she also is engaged with her business buying and selling dried fish and longganisa (pork sausage) in town. She successfully repaid her previous loan used to buy tires. To improve the services, she took a new loan to buy raincoats and other accessories.  She will use the generated income for additional capital for her existing business and hopes for the general improvement of her family.

loans.use: to buy raincoats and other accessories to improve the services

loans.name: Benjamen

texts.en: Benjamen, a father of two, provides transportation services in his village to make a living. For more than ten years, he has earned well to provide for the family. His wife works abroad. He needs repairs and maintenance on his motorcycle to improve the services to his customers. With the microfinance loan of GDMPC, his plan was realized. In the future, he wants to acquire a new unit of motorcycle to use for the expansion of his services.

loans.use: to pay for repairs and maintenance on his transportation services vehicle

loans.name: Razia

texts.en: Razia is a 41-year-old married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store at the corner of her house. She has nine years of experience in this field.  Her husband also assists her by purchasing goods from the market as he has maintained many contacts for years. She is a mother of nine children and is motivated to provide her family with good quality food, clothing and health. She wants to grow her business so she requested a loan of PKR 40,000 to buy packs of salt, biscuits and beverages to meet with the increasing demand at her store. She is expecting a boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy packs of salt, biscuits and beverages.

loans.name: Tahira

texts.en:
Tahira is a 41-year-old married woman. She runs a business to sell dressmaking supplies. 

She offers a great collection of laces and ribbons, and earns enough to contribute to the family's income. Tahira wants to grow her business, so she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for  40,000 PKR. She intends to use this loan  to purchase a greater variety of laces and ribbons in different colors to increase her sales. 

Tahira is in her 6th loan cycle and has a good credit history. She is hopeful that this loan will bring positive changes to her business.

loans.use: to purchase a greater variety of laces and ribbons in different colors.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more oil, rice, peppers, cassava, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Luis Antonio

texts.es: Antonio a sus 67 años de edad a dedicado la mayor parte de su vida a la ganaderia y agricultura, comenta que su rutina diaria es de levantar a las 3 de la mañana e irse a ordeñar sus vacas; Antonio vive con su esposa,  hija y sus dos ñietos los cuales estan a su cuidado,el nuevo credito lo va a destinar  a la compra de una vacona, el dice que de la leche a podido cumplir  responsablemente con sus obligaciones del anterior prestamo que recibio de Fodemi, de esta actividad obtiene la mayor parte de sus ingresos  el cual esta destiando al sustento de su familia, su proposito mas grande es poder ayudar a su hija  con el estudio de sus ñietos ya que el quiere que sean profesionales y triunfen en la vida.
texts.en: Antonio is 67 years old and has spent most of his life raising cattle and farming.  He says that his daily routine includes waking up at 3:00 A.M. so that he can milk the cows.  Antonio lives with his wife, daughter, and two grandchildren who are under his care.  His new loan will be used to buy a cow.  Antonio said that selling milk allowed him to responsibly complete the obligations of his previous loan from FODEMI.  The money he earns from this activity makes up a large part of his income, which is used to sustain his family.  His larger goal is to help his daughter provide for the education of his grandchildren so that they can become professionals who are successful in life.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Shoira

texts.ru:
Шоира позитивная и трудолюбивая женщина в возрасте 38 лет. Она замужем и имеет троих детей. Живёт она в небольшом сельском посёлке. С детства Шоира мечтала стать преподавателем, но так сложились обстоятельства, что она не смогла получить высшего образования из-за финансовой недостаточности в семье. Сразу после окончания средней школы Шоиру выдали замуж. И так она стала домохозяйкой. Она вместе со своим  мужем стараются делать всё возможное, чтобы обеспечивать своих детей всем необходимым.

Для того, чтобы иметь постоянный доход на пропитание Шоира вместе со своим мужем начали свой бизнес. Они занимаются земледелием и животноводством. Шоира выращивает скот, затем продаёт полученное от скота мясо и молоко. От этого бизнеса Шоира получает хороший доход. Муж Шоиры также работает в местной мастерской и  его работа приносит дополнительный доход в семью. Их совместного дохода хватает на проживание среднего уровня. И пока у них недостаточно средств, чтобы покрывать все имеющиеся нужды. В данный момент Шоира с мужем хотят купить ещё несколько голов скота для откармливания. Поэтому она обратилась в Арванд и хочет взять кредит на покупку скота. Шоира заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку, вследствие которой  улучшится качество жизни её семьи.
texts.en:
Shoira is a positive and hardworking woman of the age of 38 years. She is married and has three children. She lives in a small village. Since childhood, Shoira dreamed of becoming a teacher, however circumstances were such that she was not able to get higher education due to the family's insufficient finances. 

Right after finishing secondary school, Shoira got married and became a housewife. Together with her husband she tries to do everything possible in order to provide their children with all necessary things. To have a stable income for food, Shoira and her husband started a business. They work with agriculture and livestock breeding. Shoira breeds cattle, and then she sells the milk and meat from it. She gets a good income from this business. 

Shoira's husband also works as a local master carpenter, and his work brings the family an additional income. Their combined income is sufficient for living at a middle-class level. Still, they don't have sufficient funds to cover all their needs. 

Currently Shoira and her husband would like to purchase some additional heads of cattle for breeding. Therefore, she turned to Arvand and would like to take a loan to purchase cattle. Shoira thanks Arvand in advance for the support, due to which the family's life quality will improve.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Nahid

texts.en: Nahid has expertise in hand embroidery. She has been using her skill to provide for her family for over 12 years now. She is proud to have become famous in her community to be the best at making beautiful patterns with thread and beads. Her designs are much in demand and she has managed to consolidate a clientele that allows her to contribute to the expenses of her home. To help her to continue her operations, she has requested a loan of PKR 40,000 to buy reels of thread in different colors and packs of beads, sequins and stones for embellishment. In this way she would be able to cater to more customers consistently. She is hopeful to get an increase in her income by targeting more customers. She is in her seventh loan cycle with a good credit history.

loans.use: to buy reels of thread in different colors and packs of beads, sequins and stones.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to pay for his daughter's education.

loans.name: Sattan

texts.en:
Sattan is a 30-year-old married lady who has run a small general store in her community for many years.  

She offers a variety of grocery items at a reasonable price and has retained many customers who regularly shop at her store. Sattan makes enough money  to provide for her family. She requests 50,000 PKR to restock her supply of rice, sugar, grains and flour.  She will purchase these items from the market at lower rates. In this way she would be able to consistently meet the increasing demand. 

She is in her 7th loan cycle and has a good repayment history.  She wishes to utilize part of her revenue to increase her business capital.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, grains, and flour.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine.

loans.name: Roger

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal JUNTOS POR EL DESARROLLO ECHARATI,el banco está ubicado en la provincia de La Convención ,distrito de Echarate y departamento de Cusco.
El socio Roger  tiene 31 años de edad y  es soltero, el socio alterna sus actividades diarias trabajando en una institución pública, él socio lleva buen tiempo trabajando para esta institución  el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su trabajo, el socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma salir adelante.
El socio solicito el crédito para comprar bienes de consumo entre otros.
El socio se siente agradecido por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
He is a member of the JUNTOS POR EL DESARROLLO ECHARATI communal bank, located in the La Convención province, within the Echarate district and the Cusco department.

Roger is 31 years old, single, and works for a public institution.  He’s been working there for a long time and things are going well for him, thanks to the effort he puts in daily.  He wants to continue working so he can get ahead.

He is asking for a loan to buy consumer goods among others.

He is grateful for this loan and is committed to making his payments on schedule.

loans.use: to buy consumer goods.

loans.name: Miguelina

texts.es: La señora Miguelina, tiene 42 años de edad, esta casada con el señor Felipe, alcanzo a estudiar la primaria, cuenta con dos dependientes económicos a su cargo las cuales son sus hijas y actualmente junto a su familia vive en su propia casa que se halla situado en la ciudad de Cochabamba. Tiene como actividad económica la producción pecuaria, producción de leche cruda de ganado bovino, esta actividad prácticamente la desarrolla durante toda la gestión de forma que sus ingresos son constantes. La señora es una persona trabajadora y responsable que quiere seguir mejorando su actividad económica y para ello solicita un crédito para realizar la compra de alimento (ensilaje de maíz) para su ganado y de esta manera asegurar el suministro de alimentación para la presente gestión lo cual repercutirá en buenos ingresos que mejoraran la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Señora Miguelina is 42 years old. She is married to Señor Felipe, managed to get a primary school education, and she is responsible for two daughters who are financially dependent. She currently lives together with her family in their own house situated in the city of Cochabamba. Her economic activity is livestock production and production of raw cow's milk. She carries out this activity practically the whole season, so she has a constant source of income. 

Miguelina is a hardworking and responsible person who wants to continue improving her economic activity, so she is requesting a loan to purchase feed (corn silage) for her cattle. This will ensure the supply of feed for the current season, which will be reflected in good income that will improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy feed (corn silage) for her cattle

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth, a 58-year-old married mother, has been rearing pigs for two years now. She also rears chicken and sells household goods, earning a monthly income of KES.20,000.

Having repaid her previous loan, Elizabeth has requested a new one for KES.24,000 to buy feeds for her pigs. Her income will be used to buy household goods in bulk and more animal feeds.

loans.use: to buy more feeds for her pigs

loans.name: Evangelina

texts.es: La señora  Evangelina, es una persona responsable y trabajadora, tiene 53 años de edad, su esposo falleció y se quedo a cargo de todo, tiene un hijo dependiente de sus ingresos, se dedica a la actividad económica  de la agricultura. Sin embargo por los gastos de la muerte de su esposo y los fenómenos climatológicos de lluvias constantes que afectaron al cultivo de su frejol en la anterior temporada , sus ingresos se vieron afectados, para su canasta familiar y también para la compra de insumos para su trabajo, con la intención de mejorar sus ingresos y la calidad de vida de su familia, la señora Evangelina solicita un crédito para la compra de insumos agrícolas y así podrá continuar trabajando y enmendar la situación crítica que atraviesa su familia.
texts.en: Evangelina is a responsible and hard working person. She is 53 years old. Her husband passed away and left her in charge of everything. She has one child dependent on her income. She makes a living working in agriculture. But, because of the funeral costs of her husband and in-climate weather, like constant rain that effected her bean harvest in previous years, her income has also been adversely affected. Evangelina is asking for a loan for the good of family finances and to purchase agricultural supplies for her work, with the goal of increasing her earnings and her quality of life. Evangelina wants to continue working and to make right the current critical situation her family faces.

loans.use: purchase agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Ahshijolneng Group

texts.en:
In 2014, five like-minded tribal women from Motbung in the state of Manipur, India came together to form a group called Ashijolneng. They guide and help one another to empower themselves in their businesses and help improve their lives. 

Lhaineilhing is the featured member, pictured with her hand raised. She is 36 years old, a mother to three daughters and two sons. Her two older kids are in pre-secondary and three younger kids are in primary and intermediate grade. Her husband is a carpenter by profession; he makes furniture such as beds, chairs, shelves, tables and wardrobes, etc. per customer’s order. 

In order to construct the furniture her husband requires materials such as planks, nails, paint and good tools. Therefore, Lhaineilhing wanted to access a loan to invest money to buy all the required materials for the carpentry work. The family’s income relies on this business as this is one of the main income-generating sources and failing to complete the customer’s order on time means the income of the family is scant, too. 

With the little extra savings she has after managing the household and children’s expenditures, and in order to supplement the income of the family, Lhaineilhing buys meat from the butcher and sells it for a profit in the market. From the little profit she gets she will repay the loan, says Lhaineilhing. She wishes to access another loan to start a piggery farm as this business could generate lots of income. Likewise, the rest of the group members also need loans for their respective income-generating activities. Piggery farming, vegetable vending, and grocery store are some of the activities of the group.

loans.use: To buy carpentry equipment such as nails, planks, paint, etc.

loans.name: Haticha

texts.ru:
Хатича жизнерадостныая  и трудолюбивая женщина  в возрасте 54 лет. Она вдова и имеет на иждевении двоих детей. Она недавно обратилась в Арванд впервые, когда узнала, что есть возможность получить финансовую поддержку.  Сама Хатича живёт со своей семьёй в сельской местности. Она не имеет высшего образования, так как не было возможности учиться в Университете из-за финансовых трудностей в семье. Но с ранних лет она научилась рукоделию и шитью от своей матери. И сейчас эти навыки помогают ей проживать. 

Для того, чтобы иметь нормальный доход на пропитание, Хатича занимается своим делом. Она швея. Шьет женские платья на заказ. Также Хатича подрабатывает тем, что шьет курпачи и подушки на заказ для свадебных мероприятий.  От данного дела она получает хороший доход.  Сейчас Хатича хочет купить себе более усовершенствованную швейную машинку, которая будет работать лучше и качественней и производить лучший товар. А также ей нужно купить несколько рулонов материала. Поэтому она обратилась в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку швейной машинки для развития своего бизнеса. Хатича очень надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Haticha is a cheerful and hardworking woman of the age of 54. She is a widow and has two children who depend on her. She turned to Arvand for the first time not long ago, as she learnt that it was possible to get financial support. 

Haticha lives with her family in a village. She does not have higher education, as it was not possible for her to study at the university due to her family's financial difficulties. However, since her young years, she learnt needlework and sewing from her mother. Currently this knowledge helps her to survive. To have a normal income for food, Haticha has her own business. She is a seamstress. She sews women's clothing on order. Haticha also earns money sewing kurpachas (traditional blankets) and pillows on order for wedding events. She gets a good income from this business. 

Currently, Haticha would like to purchase a more modern sewing machine, which will work better, of higher quality and also produce better goods. She also needs to purchase a few rolls of fabric. Therefore she turned to Arvand and would like to receive a loan to purchase the sewing machine to expand her business. Haticha hopes for a positive result and thanks Arvand in advance for the support.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Aneela

texts.en: Aneela is a 25-year-old married woman. For the past five years she has been selling spices which are used in cooking food. She purchases spices in bulk from wholesale markets and then sells them in packs of various sizes. She has become famous by providing good quality spices in her locality and earns enough to spend a decent life. She is a responsible mother of two children and needs to earn more to bear the daily expenditures of her family members. For this reason she requested a loan of 45,000 PKR to buy salt, red chilies, black pepper and turmeric in large quantities. She is in her fifth loan cycle and has shown good repayment behavior. She wishes to utilize her earned profit to provide a better standard of living for her family members.

loans.use: to buy salt, red chilies, black pepper and turmeric in large quantities.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more goods for her business

loans.name: Nargiza

texts.ru: Наргиза образованная женщина средних лет. Она в течение 10 лет работает преподавателем начальных классов в местной школе своего района Спитамен. Ее муж дехканин и он занимается посевом урожаев. Наргизе 35 лет. Она имеет двух детей, которым по 7 и 9 лет. Последние 8 лет Наргиза одновременно занимается еще и животноводством. Она работает усердно, чтобы улучшить условия жизни. При дворе своего дома она выращивает скот. В этом ей помогает муж. Наргиза берет кредит для своего животноводческого бизнеса. Она хочет закупить несколько молодых бычков и увеличить их поголовье. Она ожидает поддержки.
texts.en: Nargiza is an educated, middle-aged woman.  She has been working as an elementary school teacher at a local school of her Spitamen district for 10 years. Her husband is a farmer, involved in planting crops. Nargiza is 35 years old.  She has two children, who are 7 and 9 years old. Nargiza has also been simultaneously involved in animal husbandry for the last 8 years. She works diligently to improve her quality of life. She raises livestock in the yard of her house. Her husband helps her with this. Nargiza is requesting this loan for her animal husbandry business. She wants to buy several young bulls and increase their headcount. She awaits support.

loans.use: to buy young bulls for fattening up and resale

loans.name: Honronya Group

texts.fr:
Mariées majoritairement dans des ménages polygamiques, les dix (10) membres du groupe Horonya  ont en moyenne 43 ans et 4 enfants. Elles habitent toutes à Badialan III l’un des quartiers de Bamako et se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage et de leurs activités génératrices de revenu au marché de Badialan III. Les membres du groupe font le petit commerce de, condiments (oignons), draps, savons, charbon du bois  et habits. Dans l’intention d’accroitre leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe ont décidé de collaborer avec Soro Yiriwaso et sont à leur 2ème cycle de prêt solidaire.
Madame  Fanta (femme  assise à l’extrême droite sur la photo) est une grande vendeuse de condiments (oignons). Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter 20 sacs d’oignons en gros à Bamako.La revente se fait en détails au Badialan III  en ambulant à une clientèle composée majoritairement de femmes. Madame Fanta compte avoir avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 95 000 FCFA qui sera utilisé, pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et satisfaire les petits besoins du foyer.
texts.en:
Most of them married in polygamous households, the ten members of the group Horonya average 43 years of age and four children each. The women all live in Badialan III, a district in Bamako. And they know one another through ties of community and their revenue-generating businesses at the Badialan III market. The group members have small-scale businesses involving condiments (onions), bed sheets, soaps, charcoal, and clothing.

Wanting to increase their business capital, the group members decided to collaborate with the the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso and are now on their second solidarity loan cycle. 

Ms. Fanta (the woman sitting at the far right in the photo) is a major vendor of condiments (onions). She intends to use her loan to purchase 20 sacks of onions wholesale in Bamako. Going door to door, her sales are made at the retail level to a customer base composed mostly of women in Badialan III.

With this loan, Ms. Fanta is planning on an average monthly profit of 95,000 francs CFA that will be used for reinvesting in her business and meeting sundry household needs.

loans.use: to purchase condiments, such as onions

loans.name: Marhabo

texts.ru: Мархабо занимается животноводством и торговлей. Она трудолюбивая и энергичная женщина из района Спитамен. Мархабо замужем и воспитывает двоих детей. Ей 40 лет. Она на протяжении более 6 лет активно занимается разведением крупнорогатого скота. Е в бизнесе помогают члены семьи. Мархабо намеревается увеличить поголовье скота, она при дворе дома имеет большой коровник. Чтобы реализовать свою цель она запрашивает кредит, так как не имеет достаточного сбережения. Она всецело надеется на поддержку.
texts.en: Marhabo is involved in animal husbandry and sales. She is a hardworking and energetic woman from the Spitamen district. Marhabo is married and raising two children. She is 40 years old. She has been actively involved in raising cattle for over 6 years. Her family members help her with the business. Marhabo intends to increase her livestock headcount; she has a large cowshed in the yard of her house. She is requesting this loan to achieve her goal because she does not have enough savings. She wholly hopes for the support.

loans.use: to buy cattle in order to expand her business

loans.name: Madinakhon

texts.ru:
Мадинахон известная портниха в селе Б.Гафуровского района города Худжанд. Ее муж продавец, а дети - сын и дочь учатся в школе. Мадинахон занимается пошивом женских платьев национального покроя на протяжении 5 лет. Клиентки всегда довольны ее работой. Так как она ответственная швея и всегда старается выполнять свои заказы в срок и качественно. 
Мадинахон сейчас намеревается расширить свой швейный бизнес. Она просит кредит, чтобы приобрести новую вышивальную машинку,  а также провести ремонт в рабочей комнате, чтобы создать комфортные условия для приема клиенток. Она действительно нуждается в данном кредите и ждет Вашей поддержки.
texts.en: Madinakhon is a known seamstress in the village of the B. Gafurov district of Khujand city. Her husband is a salesperson, and children - son and daughter -  attend a school. Madinakhon has been involved in sewing women's national dresses for 5 years. Her clients are always happy with her work because she is a famous seamstress and always tries to fulfill her orders with quality and on-time. Currently, Madinakhon is intending to expand her sewing business. She is requesting this loan to purchase a new embroidery machine and also to make repairs in her work room in order to create comfortable conditions for visiting customers. She really needs this loan and is awaiting Your support.

loans.use: to purchase a new embroidery machine and to make repairs in her work room in order to expand her business

loans.name: Fatou

texts.fr:
Madame Fatou âgée de 47 ans, fait parti des premiers clients de ce guichet, mais n’a jamais bénéficié de crédit. Elle s’active dans la restauration et le commerce de tissus depuis plus de 20 ans. Fatou est mariée et mère de 7 enfants dont le plus grand a 20 ans et le plus jeune, 2 ans.
Fatou sollicite ce crédit afin d’acheter des tissus, de payer un tailleur pour la confection d’ensembles destinés à la commercialisation. Le Produit fini, elle le place dans le voisinage, et chez sa clientèle dans les bureaux. Avec le bénéfice des deux activités, elle répond aux besoins quotidiens de ses enfants et aux siens. Elle peut gérer toute seule ses cotisations mensuelles dans le quartier et autres engagements personnels.
Fatou rêve de devenir autonome un jour et ne plus avoir recours aux crédits. Elle veut aussi aider ses enfants à prendre un bon départ, et aussi construire sa maison pour eux dans le futur.
texts.en:
Mrs. Fatou is 47 years old and was among the first clients at [her local] branch [of UIMCEC], but has never received a loan. She has been working in the restaurant industry and in the sale of fabric for more than 20 years. Fatou is married and the mother of seven children, the eldest 20 years old and the youngest 2.

Fatou is seeking this loan in order to purchase fabric and pay a tailor to make outfits that will be used for marketing. The finished product will be placed throughout the neighborhood and in the offices of her clients. With the profits from these two activities, Fatou will meet the daily needs of her children and herself. She will be able to manage her monthly payments in the neighborhood on her own, as well as other personal commitments.

Fatou dreams of one day becoming independent and no longer needing loans. She also wants to help her children get off to a good start and build her home for them in the future.

loans.use: To purchase fabric with which to [have] outfits [made] to sell.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es: El señor  Jose es una persona trabajadora, tiene 45 años de edad vive en la provincia de Mizque, tiene a su dependencia dos de sus hijos que estudian, se dedica trabajar en la agricultura y en sus tiempo libre a trabajar de jornalero. No cuenta con terrenos de grandes extensiones, por tal razón trabaja en terrenos en campaña con otros socios, en la anterior temporada por los problemas climatológicos tuvo problemas con la cosecha de sus productos agrícolas, las constantes lluvias no dejaron cosechar frejol. Por los motivos mencionados  sufrió un desequilibrio en sus ingresos económicos para cubrir los gastos familiares y la compra de insumos para la agricultura. Con el objetivo de mejorar sus ingresos solicita un crédito para la compra de semillas e insumos necesarios para su agricultura, de forma que logre cubrir los gastos de su familia.
texts.en: Jose is a hard working person. He is 45 years old and lives in the province of Mizque. He has two children who are dependent on him and who go to school. He makes a living in agriculture and in his free time he is a day laborer. He doesn't have a lot of land, and so he also works the land of others along with his colleagues. In the previous harvest, due to inclement weather, he had problems with his harvest because of the constant rain that prevented him from harvesting his beans. And so, he suffered a set back in his finances and in order to cover family expenses and to purchase agricultural supplies, he is asking for a loan. It will be used to improve his earnings and to purchase seeds and necessary supplies so that he can continue to support his family.

loans.use: purchase seeds and supplies.

loans.name: Veronicah

texts.en:
Veronicah is 50 years old. She is married and a mother of four children. She supports five more people. She has been in this business for the last 15 years, and she earns a monthly income of KES. 21,520 which she uses to support her family.  

She would like a loan of KES. 34,369 with which she will pay her children's school fees.

She has successfully repaid all her previous loans. She hopes that her children will have a good education.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her children

loans.name: Comuzone Iv Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “COMUZONE IV”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Margarita ella es viuda y tiene 63 años; La socia trabaja en su negocio de tienda de abarrotes y también la socia se dedica al negocio de venta de truchas, la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, leche y aceite, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 1 año en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar leche, azúcar, aceite y arroz.

Las socias que están pegados a la foto grupal se les tomo la foto después de la reunión porque pidieron permiso por motivos de trabajo.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de venta de tejidos, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de imprenta.
 
 


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to Comuzone IV Communal Bank, located in the district of Cusco in the province and department of Cusco.

The member, Margarita, is 63 years old and a widow.  She works in her grocery store business and also sells trout. She sells staple items such as rice, sugar, milk, and oil.  She works from 8 a.m. until 6 p.m.  She has had her business for a year and it's going very well for her.  Her dream is to expand her grocery store.

Margarita's requesting the loan to buy milk, sugar, oil, and rice.

The members attached to the group photo had permission to have their photos taken after the meeting because of work reasons.

The other members earn a living in clothing sales, textile sales, a grocery store, and a printing business.

Margarita is grateful to those who are part of her dream through this means, and she promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy milk, sugar, oil, and rice

loans.name: Sakina

texts.en:
Sakina is a 58-year-old married woman and the mother of five children. The income generated by her husband was insufficient to cover all household expenses, so she initiated her business of milk sales. She has been doing it for many years and has become famous for providing good quality milk in her locality.

With the support of Kashf Foundation, she has gradually improved her business; currently she has requested a loan of 50,000 PKR to purchase another cow. This will help her to increase her sales which will ultimately help in generating more income for her.

loans.use: to purchase another cow.

loans.name: Sahidod

texts.ru:
Сахидод жизнерадостный и трудолюбивый мужчина  в возрасте 25 лет. Он женат и имеет 4-их детей. Он обратился в Арванд впервые, когда узнал, что есть возможность получить финансовую поддержку.  Сам Сахидод живёт со своей семьёй в городской местности. Он не имеет высшего образования, так как не было возможности учиться в Университете из-за финансовых трудностей в семье. Жена Сахидода также не имеет образования и является домохозяйкой, она занимается домашними делами и воспитанием детей.

Чтобы иметь доход на пропитание, Сахидод занимается своим бизнесом. Он занимается продажей овощей и рисом. От данного дела он получает хороший доход, который может тратить на все нужды своей семьи. Но сейчас его запасы овощей иссякли и ему необходимо закупить несколько мешков овощей.  Сейчас Сахидод хочет увеличить количество товара  для расширения своего бизнеса. Поэтому он обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на закуп овощей для продажи. Сахидод очень надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Sahidod is a cheerful and hardworking man of the age of 25. He is married and has four children. He turned to Arvand for the first time, because he learnt that it is possible to receive financial support. 

Sahidod lives with his family in an urban area. He does not have higher education, as he was not able to go to university due to his family's financial difficulties. Sahidod's wife does not have an education either. She is a housewife and does the household chores and raises the children. In order to have an income for food, Sahidod has his own business. He works with selling vegetables and rice. He gets a good income from this business, which he can spend on all the family's needs. However, currently his stock of vegetables ran out and he needs to purchase additional sacks of vegetables. 

Currently, Sahidod would like to increase the number of goods and expand his business. Therefore he turned to Arvand and would like to receive a loan for purchasing vegetables to sell. Sahidod hopes very much for a positive result and thanks Arvand in advance for the support.

loans.use: to buy vegetables

loans.name: Jacqueline Liseth

texts.es:
Jacqueline tiene 31 años de edad, estudió hasta 9° grado de educación básica, actualmente está casada y su esposo trabaja como jornalero limpiando una lotificación, tiene dos hijos que viven con ella y solo uno asiste a la escuela.

Jacqueline tiene una pequeña tienda que inició hace aproximadamente seis meses, decidió poner este negocio porque las personas de su colonia tenían que viajar hasta el mercado para comprar y ahora ella quiere tener a la venta los productos básicos para el hogar, antes no hacia más que el oficio doméstico pero ahora también ayuda a los pocos ingresos de su esposo atendiendo la tienda desde las 5:00 AM hasta las 7:00 PM.


El préstamo solicitado lo necesita para comprar más mercadería como maíz, frijol, azúcar, jabón, y luego seguir aumentando en las ventas para mejorar sus ingresos.

Su sueño es tener a largo plazo una tienda que le permita obtener ingresos suficientes para darle estudio a sus hijos y que sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Jacqueline is 31 years old and studied basic education up to 9th grade. She is married; her husband works as a laborer cleaning a housing complex. She has two children who live with her, one of whom goes to school.

Jacqueline has a small store which she decided to open about six months ago because the people in her town had to travel all the way to the market to buy goods. Now she wants to sell basic items for the home. Whereas before she was a homemaker, now she is able to add to her husband’s small income by running the store from 5:00am to 7:00pm.

She is requesting a loan to buy more merchandise such as corn, beans, sugar, and soap, to keep increasing sales and her income.

Her long-term dream is to have a store which will enable her to obtain enough income to provide her children with and education so that they can become professionals.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise such as corn, beans, sugar, soap, etc.

loans.name: Uzma

texts.en:
Uzma has successfully built her business stitching clothes with the support of Kashf Foundation and Kiva. By this time she has attained a good number of customers and makes a good amount of income to contribute to the family income. 

Previously with the help of Kiva she was able to purchase stitching material. Now she is in her 6th loan cycle and has applied for a loan of 50,000 PKR to purchase spools of thread, cloth, ribbons and buttons. This will enable her to increase her to stitching and finish up more dresses on time to earn more profit.

loans.use: to purchase spools of thread, cloth, ribbons and buttons.

loans.name: José Daniel

texts.es:
José tiene 27 años de edad, estudió hasta 6° grado de educación Básica, está acompañado desde hace dos años, aún no tiene hijos, su compañera de vida se dedica a los oficios domésticos y al cuidado de una hermana discapacitada, y junto con su padre son los únicos que dependen de ella.


José trabaja en la agricultura, algo que ha hecho desde hace aproximadamente 6 años, antes vivía en la ciudad con unos familiares pero debido a la delincuencia emigró al campo y decidido trabajar ahí sin ningún problema. El lugar de trabajo está a tres cuadras de su casa y trabaja cuatro horas diarias. 


Con el préstamo solicitado a CrediCampo José comprará cuatro sacos de fertilizantes de 200 libras  porque cultivará una hectárea y media y pagará mano de obra. 

José sueña con seguir adelante con su esposa, y en un futuro poder construir una casa digna pues ahora vive en una humilde casa de lámina.
texts.en:
José is 27 years old and he studied up to the 6th grade. He has been in a relationship for two years, but he does not have any children. His wife dedicates herself to domestic chores and caring for a handicapped sister and along with her father, are the only two people dependent on her. 

José works in agriculture, something he has done since the 6th grade. Before, he lived in the city with some of his family, but because of delinquency, he moved to the countryside and began to work there without any problems. The site where he works is three blocks from his home and he works four hours every day. 

With the loan he is asking for from CrediCampo, José will purchase four sack of 200 lbs of fertilizer to cultivate a hectare of land and he will pay for labor. 

His dream is to continue ahead with his wife and in the future, to be able to build his own house worthy of living in because he currently lives in a house made of laminate.

loans.use: purchase fertilizer and pay for labor.

loans.name: Firuzjon

texts.ru:
Фирузчон жизнерадостный и трудолюбивый парень в возрасте 23 лет. Он пока еще не женат. Живёт он со своими родителями в городской местности. Он имеет среднее образование, после окончания школы он не продолжил своё обучение из-за финансовых проблем в семье.

Чтобы иметь доход на пропитание, Фирузчон занимается своим бизнесом. Этот бизнес он начал недавно и старается его постепенно развивать. У него имеется свой прилавок, где он продает  запчасти и детали для мобильных телефонов. От данного дела он получает хороший доход. Сейчас Фирузчон хочет расширить свой бизнес. Ему необходимо закупить некоторые запчасти для мобильных телефонов, но у него не имеется достаточно денежных средств Поэтому он обратился в Арванд для кредита на покупку запчастей и деталей для мобильных телефонов. Фирузчон очень надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Firuzjon is a cheerful and hardworking man of the age of 23. He is not yet married. He lives with his parents in an urban area. He has secondary education. After finishing school he did not continue his education due to his family's financial difficulties. 

In order to have an income for food, Firuzjon started a business. He started this business not long ago and tries to develop it gradually. He has his own stall where he sells spare parts and accessories for mobile phones. He gets a good income form this business. 

Currently, Firuzjon would like to expand his business. He needs to purchase some spare parts for mobile phones, but does not have sufficient funds. Therefore he turned to Arvand for a loan to purchase spare parts and accessories for mobile phones. Firuzjon hopes very much for a positive result and thanks Arvand in advance for the support.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts and accessories for mobile phones

loans.name: Sardar

texts.en:
Sardar is 57 years old and a dedicated mother of two children. The man shown in the photo is Sardar's husband. Her husband runs a donkey cart as a transportation service. Some years ago, he started this business with a single donkey cart. The donkeys help customers carry material from one place to another. He makes enough to meet the family's needs.

 In order to purchase a larger wooden cart for the donkey, Sardar contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of Rs. 40,000. This way her husband will be able to take more things on his cart at once, like fruit and vegetable items. This ultimately saves his time and hopefully will increase his net income. Sardar plans to spend the additional revenue on bettering the family's standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase a larger wooden cart for their donkey.

loans.name: Razia

texts.en:
Razia is a 50-year-old married woman. She has six children. Three years ago she started business selling cloth in her locality. She purchases a variety of cloth from the main city and then sells it to the people of her vicinity. She has become famous for selling good quality cloth in her community. 

Razia requested a loan of PKR 40,000 from Kashf Foundation to buy bundles of different cloth for the summer season, taking into account the choices and tastes of her customers. In this way, she would be able to earn more income through her greater sales. She hopes to have a good experience with this new loan and wants to grow her business.

loans.use: to buy bundles of different sorts of cloth for the summer season.

loans.name: Ijaz

texts.en:
Ijaz, age 35, is a married woman. She deals in business, selling animals with the support of her husband. She buys animals (baby goats & calves) at low prices, brings them up, and then sells them out in the market at higher prices. She makes enough money through her business to contribute to the family's income. She also sells milk to generate an extra amount of income. 

Ijaz needs to improve her business to bear her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase more animals. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level. She is in her fourth loan cycle, with good credit history.

loans.use: to purchase more animals.

loans.name: Akberi

texts.en:
Akberi is a hard-working woman. A year ago, she started a general store in her community to cover her household expenses.  She offers a variety of grocery items at a reasonable price and has retained many customers who regularly shop at her store. She makes enough to provide for her family. 

To make her store fully stocked, she requested a loan of 40,000 PKR which she will use to buy stock of rice, sugar, grains and flour from the market at lower rates. In this way she would be able to meet the increasing demand consistently. Akberi wishes to utilize part of her revenues to increase her business capital.

loans.use: to buy stock of rice, sugar, grains and flour.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy an embroidery machine, a sewing machine and an iron.

loans.name: Shahida

texts.en:
Shahida is a 34-year-old, married woman. She deals in a business selling cloth with her husband (also shown in the photo). She buys cloth of different fabrics in various colors and designs from the market at wholesale rates and then sells them to the people of her community. She has a varied customer base and is able to earn enough through her business. 

Shahida is requesting a 40,000 PKR loan from the Kashf Foundation to buy a wide variety of cloth in different colors and designs to attract more customers and expand her inventory. She expects a boost in her earnings with her loan and she plans to spend part of her profits on the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to buy a wide variety of cloth in different colors and designs.

loans.name: Asya

texts.en:
Asya is 19 years old. She is single and is living with her parents in Abseron region. The family members are IDPs - Internally Displaced Persons - from Fuzuli City. 

Asya’s family has a store where they sell mixed goods. Today, Asya wants to support the family business and, for this reason, she has applied to Komak Credit Union for a loan in the amount of AZN 2,100 (Azerbaijan New Manat) to buy more products to sell. She says thanks to the Kiva organization for its aid. 

In the future, Asya wants to increase the area of the store.

loans.use: to buy more products to sell.

loans.name: Mehriniso

texts.en: The name of this 55 year-old woman is Mehriniso. She is a mother with many children; she has four sons and two daughters. Mehriniso and her husband raised their children well. Now four of her children work at a farm in one of the Russian regions. Mehriniso's husband is involved in agriculture and also helps his wife with buying and selling livestock. Although Mehriniso has a secondary, specialized education, she had never worked in her profession. She has been involved in raising bulls for resale for the last 6 years. Mehriniso plans to use this loan to buy three bulls of a good breed and, together with a bull already in the household, fatten them up for 1-2 months, and then resell them with a markup at a livestock market. She intends to use the resulting profit to expand her business. This loan is very important to her.

loans.use: to buy three bulls of a good breed for fattening up and resale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to repair his vehicle.

loans.name: Shamim

texts.en:
Shamim is a 29-year-old married woman and the mother of two children. The income generated by her husband is insufficient to cover all household expenses, so she initiated her business selling cloth. She always has a good collection to offer to her customers and earns a sufficient amount of income to cover her household expenditures. 

For the improvement of her business, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of PKR 40,000 to buy bundles of good quality cloth in different colors to increase her sales. She hopes to have a good experience with this new loan and dreams of expanding her business in the near future.

loans.use: to buy bundles of good quality cloth in different colors.

loans.name: Shahmim

texts.en:
Shahmim is a 35-year-old married woman and a mother of seven children. She is a hardworking mother who is helping her family by providing a tailoring service in her community. She has been doing it for the past 10 years. She very well knows the techniques of stitching. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns enough to lead a decent life. 

To help her continue operation of her business, she requested a loan of Rs.40,000 to buy spools of thread and cloth in different colors with packs of zippers and buttons to meet the increasing demand. In addition to repaying the loan, she will use part of the revenues to deal with personal expenses.

loans.use: to buy spools of thread and cloth in different colors with packs of zippers and buttons.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase agricultural inputs for the preparation and management of land and to purchase chips and other goods to increase their sales

loans.name: Daniel Marcelo

texts.es: El joven Daniel tiene 30 años,  soltero estudia la carrera  de licenciatura en administración de empresas por las noches ya que en el día trabaja en una institución pública,  trabaja para pagar sus estudios como consultor, es este es su primer crédito con la institución y  el joven Daniel va a usar este préstamo para  la compra de una Lap Top para su uso personal, lo utilizara en sus estudios ya que le hace mucha falta para realizar sus prácticas,  Daniel enfrenta retos en su trabajo ya que es un trabajo también el hecho de que estudia por las noches, pero el joven tiene ganas de continuar y seguir adelante hasta culminar sus estudios ya después buscar trabajo en su área de estudio y de esta manera poder recibir más ingresos y después poder hacer una maestría en su área que este es su deseo.
texts.en: Daniel is 30 years old, single, and is working towards his bachelors degree in Business Administration at night, while working in a public institution during the day. This is Daniel's first loan and he will be using it to purchase a laptop for his personal use as well as to use in his studies. He faces challenges in his work because he has to study during the night time, but he wants to continue in order to find work in his field and eventually receive a masters degree.

loans.use: to purchase a laptop

loans.name: Raima

texts.ru: Раима живет в одной из сел района Шахритус, где почти все жители занимаются сельским хозяйством и животноводством. Раима тоже не исключение. Она на протяжении 10 лет во дворе своего дома выращивает крупнорогатый скот, в основном телят и бычков. Раима 54-летняя замужняя женщина. Ее муж торговец. У них четверо взрослых детей. Раиме в ее деятельности нравится то, что оно не отнимает у нее много времени и она одновременно может вести свое домашнее хозяйство. В данный момент Раиме необходимо увеличить поголовье скота в своем скотном дворе, так как у нее остался всего один теленок. Для развития бизнеса, она должна увеличить поголовье своего скота и поэтому просит кредит. Раима надеется на поддержку.
texts.en: Raima lives in one of the villages of the Shahrituz district, where almost all of the residents are involved in agriculture and animal husbandry. Raima is also no exception. She has been raising cattle, primarily calves and bulls, in the yard of her home for 10 years. Raima is a 54 year-old married woman. Her husband is a salesperson. They have four adult children. Raima likes her business because it does not take a lot of time and allows her to run her household. At the present time, Raima needs to increase the livestock headcount in her livestock yard because she only has one calf left. She has to increase the livestock headcount in order to develop her business and is requesting the loan for this purpose. Raima hopes for the support.

loans.use: to buy young calves and bulls in order to increase livestock headcount

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a car oil change machine and buy more products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: A loan of $1,200 helps Haider to buy more products and renovate his workplace.

loans.name: Sy-Bamako   Kalaban-Coro-00057 Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Alla kabo est composéuniquement de  femmes monogames. Elles ont en moyenne 42ans et 4 enfants. Elles habitent toutes à Kalaban-Plateau l’un des quartiers de Bamako et se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage.Les membres du groupe font le petit commerce d’habits (basins) de toutes les qualités et charbon du bois. Dans le but de se ravitailler au comptant, les membres du groupe ont décidé de collaborer avec Soro Yiriwaso et sont à leur 2ème cycle de prêt solidaire.
Madame Fili (femme assise en 2ème position de la gauche vers la droite sur la photo) a une grande réputation dans la vente des habits (bazins. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter 50mètres de bazins en gros au grand marché. .La revente se fait en détails à Kalaban-Plateau  et en ambulant à une clientèle mixte. Madame Fili espère réaliser avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 90 000 FCFA qui sera utilisé, pour être réinvesti dans l’activité. Elle a pour objectif d’acheter un lot à usage d’habitation dans cette relation avec Soro Yiriwaso.
texts.en:
The group called Alla Kabo is made up only of monogamous women. Their average age is 42 and they have four children on average. They all live in Kalaban-Plateau, one of the neighborhoods of Bamako, and they met through ties of neighborhood. The members of the group have small-scale businesses selling hand-dyed cloth of all sorts as well as charcoal. Wishing to pay cash when they restock their businesses, they decided to collaborate with  Soro Yiriwaso and they are on their second solidarity loan cycle. 

Madame Fili (the woman sitting second from left to right in the photo) has a good reputation for selling clothing made of bazin (hand-dyed cloth). She intends to use her loan to buy 50 meters of bazin wholesale at the Grand Market. Her sales are made retail, in  Kalaban-Plateau and on foot, to a mixed clientele.   

Madame Fili hopes to make an average monthly profit from this loan of 90,000 F CFA that will be used to reinvest in her business. Her goal is to buy a plot of land to build a house on through this relationship with Soro Yiriwaso.

loans.use: to buy better quality hand-dyed cloth.

loans.name: Wafa

texts.en:
Wafa is a 25-year-old married woman from a small village called Qabatya, near Jenin city. She is a mother of one son and two daughters. A few years ago, Wafa started her own business which is a farm for raising sheep.  It is a good business and the income is high. Wafa would like to improve her farm and expand it. 

Wafa took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy more sheep for her livestock farm. By taking this loan, Wafa will be able to improve her business and increase productivity. 

Wafa appears in the photo in her business.

loans.use: to buy more sheep for her livestock farm.

loans.name: Las Torres De Vista Verde Group

texts.es:
EVANGELINO JUAN, tiene 40 años, forma parte del grupo "Las Torres de Vista Verde" formado por seis socios unidos con un mismo fin salir adelante mediante el apoyo conjunto para hacer crecer sus negocios.

Desde aproximadamente cinco años, Evangelino Juan se dedica a brindar servicio de alquiler de lavadoras a familias, él personalmente traslada sus lavadoras a las casa de los clientes que lo solicitan, los clientes lo utilizan y luego él pasa a recogerlas.
El préstamo solicitado lo invertirá en hacer el mantenimiento de sus lavadoras, así como también aprovechará para hacer el cambio de llantas de su triciclo que es el medio en el que traslada sus lavadoras.
texts.en:
Evangelino Juan is 40 years old and is part of the group "Las Torres de Vista Verde" [The Green View Towers], which is made up of six partners. They are united by the shared goal to succeed through mutual support to grow their businesses.

For about five years, Evangelino Juan has made a living by offering a washing machine rental service to families. He personally moves his washing machines to the houses of the clients that request them, they use them, and later he returns to pick the machines up.

He will invest the requested loan in the maintenance of his washing machine as well as for improvements to his tricycle, such as a tire change, because it is the way in which he transports the washing machines.

loans.use: to maintain his washing machines as well as to make improvements on his tricycle which he uses for transporting the washing machines

loans.name: Virgen Asunta-Huancaro Ii Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “VIRGEN ASUNTA-HUANCARO II”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Nelly ella es casada y tiene 52 años y tiene 3 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de frutas, la socia vende manzanas,naranjas,uvas,platanos y mandarinas , la socia tiene un puesto de mercado donde vende las frutas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 7 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender las frutas y verduras. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar naranjas, plátanos, uvas, mandarinas y papayas.
Los socios que estan pegados a la foto grupal se les tomo la foto despues de la reunion porque pidieron permiso por motivos de trabajo.

La foto se tomo solo a 5 socias porque el dia de la reunion solo asistieron esas personas,despues al dia siguiente las otras personas recogieron su credito porque no podian venir a la reunion nos les dieron permiso en su trabajo es por ese motivo que se adjunto a mas de dos personas en la foto grupal,para la proxima reunion esperemos que todos los socios esten reunidos.
 
 
 Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de verduras, negocio de venta de fruta, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de restaurant.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The group members belong to the Virgen Asunta-Huancaro II village bank. The group is located in Cusco District, which belongs to the Province and Department of Cusco. 

The group member is Sra. Nelly, who is 52 years old and married with 3 children. She works selling fruit, and sells apples, oranges, grapes, bananas and mandarins. She has a market stall where she sells her fruit, where she works from 8am to 5pm. She has had this business for 7 years, and it's going very well for her. Her dream is to have a store where she can sell her fruits and vegetables .She is requesting this loan to buy oranges, bananas, grapes, mandarins and papayas.

The group members who appear in separate photos had their photos taken after the group meeting that they were unable to attend; they requested permission to arrive late because of work. For the next reunion we are hoping that all of the group members will be present. The other group members work selling vegetables, fruit, have general stores or restaurants. 

Nelly is grateful to those who form part of this dream and is committed to making her payments within the established time frame.

loans.use: to buy oranges, bananas, grapes, mandarins and papayas

loans.name: Uktam

texts.ru:
В теплое время года для колхозников и для полевых работников увеличивается их работа в двойне. Особенно те которые занимаются посадкой сельхоз культуры.  Уктам тоже работает на поле. Он очень трудолюбивый добродушный человек. Ему 48 лет. Женат. Его жена Шарабнисо работает колхозницей в сельской местности. У них очень дружная семья. Всегда во всем поддерживают друг друга, особенно в трудные моменты. Уктам каждой весной сажает сельхоз культуры разного вида. Он их не только на поле сажает но и у себя дома. Он имеет большой участок земли. Весь семейный Уктама состоит от выращивания сельхоз культур, которым он обеспечивает и содержит свою семью. С наступлением сезона он посеял разных видов сельхоз культур. Как мы видим на фоне фотографии первые саженцы уже дали молодых ростков, которые радует глаз Уктама. Он вдохновляется своим трудом и еще с большой любовью и заботой ухаживает за посадкой. 
Но для более хорошего урожая и для пустырного место нужны финансовые средства для удобрения и для покупки семян. Поэтому Уктам обратился в МДО Арванд за кредитом. Уктам заранее  выражает свою благодарность за поддержку и за своевременное обслуживания сотрудников организации.
texts.en: During the warm time of year the work doubles for farmers and farm workers, especially those involved in planting agricultural crops. Uktam also works on a field. He is a very hardworking and kind person. He is 48 years old, married. His wife, Sharabniso, works as a farmer in a rural area. They have a very friendly family. They always support each other in everything, especially in hard times. Uktam plants various types of agricultural crops every spring. He does not just plant them in the field, but also at home. He has a large plot of land. Uktam's entire family business consists of growing agricultural crops, with which he provides for and supports his family. He planted various types of agricultural crops with the onset of the season. As we can see on the photograph, the first seedling have already started sprouting, which makes Uktam happy. He gets inspired by his work and handles the planted crops with a lot of love and care. But for better harvest and empty space, he needs financial means for fertilizers and purchase of seeds. This is why Uktam came to Arvand for a loan. Uktam expresses his gratitude in advance for the support and timely service of the organization staff.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and seeds

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and fabric.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rice, palm oil, peppers, onions, etc., for her business.

loans.name: José Ricardo

texts.es:
José tiene 54 años de edad, estudió hasta tercer año de educación básica, no pudo estudiar porque en aquellos tiempos la escuela le quedaba muy lejos, está casado y tiene cuatro hijos de los cuales solo dos viven con él y los otros ya están acompañados.

José se dedica a cultivar en el campo, lo ha hecho toda su vida, para irse a trabajar se va a pie y trabaja 5 horas diarias.  


El préstamo solicitado a CrediCampo lo invertirá para comprar cuatro sacos de abono para fertilizar y un  novillo para la crianza.

Su sueño es tener una yunta de bueyes para poder trabajar mejor, ahorrar dinero en el arrendamiento de bueyes y si es posible trabajar más para poder obtener mejores ingresos y construir una casa digna para su familia
texts.en:
José is 54 years old. He went to school through the third grade of primary school. He wasn't able to stay in school because in those times, the school was very far away. He is married and he has four children, of whom only two live with him. The others are already married.

José earns his living farming; he has done that all his life. He goes on foot to get to work and he works five hours a day.

He will invest the loan requested from CrediCampo in the purchase of four sacks of composted material for fertilizer and a calf to raise.

His dream is to have a team of oxen so he could work better and save money on renting oxen, and, if possible, to work more to be able to obtain a better income and build a decent house for his family.

loans.use: to buy four sacks of composted material for fertilizer and a calf to raise.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy an iron, fabric, a sewing machine and an oversewing machine.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia continua dedicándose al negocio de venta de ropa, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia lleva años dedicándose a este negocio el cual le trae satisfacciones tanto económicas como personales, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para comprar casacas para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The borrower continues to sell clothing.  She is a responsible and dedicated person who has had this business for years.  This gives her satisfaction, as well as financial rewards.  She wants to continue to work and supporting her family.

She is asking for this loan to buy jackets for her business.

She is grateful for this loan and is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy jackets.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es: El señor José  tiene 21 años, él se dedica a fabricación de artesanías de metal el realiza pequeños jugadores de metal para los futbolines que son una juego de futbol, tiene su taller ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución,  el señor jose va a usar este préstamo para la compra de material de construcción para la refacción  de su vivienda ya que quiere hacer construir un cuarto para que guarde ahí sus trabajos realizados, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es la falta de efectivo para el terminado de la construcción de su casa para lo cual le falto par algunos detalles,  el señor José enfrenta retos en su negocio que son continuar ampliando su actividad teniendo más clientes su negocio y  va a utilizar los beneficios en ampliar su negocio, el señor José es una persona muy trabajadora se siente muy agradecido por la oportunidad que le brindan.
texts.en:
Jose, 21, makes a living creating metal handicrafts.  He makes little metal players for foosball tables which are football games.  He has his shop at his house. 

This loan is his first sequence in the institution.  Jose will use this loan to buy construction materials to refurbish his home because he wants to construct a room in which to store his finished products.  His reason for requesting this loan is that he lacks the cash to finish the construction which is missing a few details.  

Jose confronts challenges in his business which are to continue expanding his work, his business now having more customers, and he is going to use the profits to expand his business.  Jose is a very hard-working person and he feels very thankful for the opportunity you offer to him.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Israel Alberto

texts.es: El señor Israel de 25 años de edad,es soltero, vive con la señora Melvi, tiene 2 hijos que dependen de sus ingresos, se dedica a prestar servicios de carpintería (fabricación de mesas y sillas) desde muy joven y trabaja de manera independiente desde hace 4 años, para el armado y lijado de mesas y sillas cuenta con la ayuda de su conyugue, toda la fabricación de mesas y sillas son entregadas en el mercado a distintas comerciantes, las que se encargan de venderlas, de esta manera genera los ingresos necesarios para poder sustentar a su familia, la presente solicitud de crédito es para la compra de materia prima (madera) para la fabricación de mesas y sillas, para de esta manera generar mayores ingresos y poder satisfacer sus necesidades económicas, el señor es una persona responsable y tiene muchas ganas de superarse, siempre velando por el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en:
Twenty-five-year-old Isreal is single, lives with Melvi and has two children who depend on his income.  

He has been making a living by offering carpentry services (making tables and chairs) since he was very young and has worked independently for about four years.  For the assembly and sanding of the tables and chairs, he has the help of his partner.  All the output of tables and chairs is delivered to the market to different vendors, who are tasked with selling them.  In this way, he generates the income necessary to be able to support his family.  

The current request for a loan is to buy raw material (wood) to make tables and chairs so that in this way he can generate more income in order to satisfy his economic needs.  Isreal is a responsible person and has a lot of desire to succeed, while always watching out for the well-being of his family.

loans.use: to buy raw material (wood).

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase three basic computers to set up a small internet café in his community.

loans.name: Elvia Liliana

texts.es:
Elvia trabaja en compañía de su esposo como mayordomos de una finca de recreo en el municipio de Sopetran, allí realizan algunos trabajos de mantenimiento y cuidado de la finca.
Ella desea empezar a independizarse y comenzar a ganar sus propios ingresos, por esta razón tiene el proyecto de comprar bebidas, frituras y golosinas para vender a las personas que hagan uso de la finca.
De este modo podrá iniciar con su propio negocio y comenzara a capitalizarse.
Ella sabe que este proceso de inicio no es fácil y por eso requiere de ayuda para comprar todo el surtido de productos para realizar sus ventas.
Con los ingresos obtenidos por las ventas podrán dar una mejor calidad de vida a sus dos hijos menores que lastimosamente están alejados por motivos laborales.
texts.en:
Elvia works with her husband looking after a holiday property in the town of Sopetran, where they carry out maintenance and care of the property. 

She wants to become independent and start earning her own income, which is why she has the plan to buy drinks, snacks and sweets to sell to people who use the property. That way she can start her own business and begin to build capital. 

She knows that the start-up process is not easy and therefore needs help to buy the whole range of products to make her sales. 
With the proceeds from the sales, she will be able to give a better quality of life to her two children who unfortunately live away from her for work reasons.

loans.use: to buy a range of products such as drinks, snacks and sweets

loans.name: Marta Margarita

texts.es:
Marta tiene 51 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, ella es madre soltera y le está ayudando con mucho sacrificio a su hija para que estudie en la universidad.

Ella se dedica a la venta de antojitos y fruta picada en bolsa, en un puesto cerca del parque y lo ha estado haciendo durante muchos años, antes trabajaba vendiendo verduras en el mercado, el lugar de trabajo le queda a una cuadra de su casa, su hija trabaja por horas en una tienda mientras no estudia, además le ayuda a su madre a preparar la venta y hacer sus tareas de la universidad pues descansan muy poco.
 
El préstamo lo necesita para comprar algunos recipientes para cocinar las enchiladas y yuca frita y también para comprar maíz, pero también lo invertirá en cancelar dos mensualidades de la universidad de su hija. 

Marta sueña con que su hija termine su carrera ya que está haciendo un gran esfuerzo y además sueña con tener una casa aunque sea pequeña pero propia porque por el momento alquila una casa que está en mal estado.
texts.en:
Marta, age 51, did not have the opportunity to go to school.  She is a single mother.  With great sacrifice she is helping her daughter attend the university.

She sells food and chopped fruit in bags at a stand near the park.  She has been doing this for many years.  She used to work selling vegetables at the market.  The place where she works is one block from her house.  Her daughter works some hours at a store when she is not in school.  She also helps her mother prepare for the sales, and she does her school work for the university.  They rest very little.

She needs the loan to buy some containers to cook the enchiladas and fried yucca.  She will also buy corn and pay for two months of her daughter’s university fees.

Marta dreams of her daughter completing her degree because she is making a great effort.  She also dreams of having a house.  Even though it would be little, it would be her own.  At the moment she rents a house that is in bad condition.

loans.use: to buy some containers to cook the enchiladas and fried yucca, to buy corn, and to pay for two months of her daughter’s university fees.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es: El joven José tiene 27 años,  soltero estudia la carrera  de técnico superior por las noches ya que en el día trabaja en una empresa de seguridad,  trabaja para pagar sus estudios como guardia de seguridad, es este es su primer crédito con la institución y  el joven José va a usar este préstamo para  la compra de una Lap Top para su uso personal, lo utilizara en sus estudios ya que le hace mucha falta para realizar sus prácticas,  José enfrenta retos en su trabajo ya que es un trabajo de alto riesgo y también el hecho de que estudia por las noches, pero el joven tiene ganas de continuar y seguir adelante hasta culminar sus estudios ya después buscar trabajo en su área de estudio y de esta manera poder recibir más ingresos y después ingresar a la universidad para estudiar una carrera a nivel licenciatura que este es su deseo.
texts.en:
José, who is 27 years old and single, is studying a Higher Technical course in the evenings since he works for a security firm during the day. He works as a security guard in order to pay for his studies. 

This is his first loan with the institution and young José is going to use the loan to buy a laptop for his own personal use. He will use it in his studies as he really needs it for carrying out his practicals. 

José faces challenges in his work because it is a high-risk job and also because he has to study at night, but he wants to continue and make progress towards completing his studies. Afterwards he wants to find work related to his field of study so he can make more income and then go on to university to study for a degree course, which is his dream.

loans.use: to buy a laptop.

loans.name: Emérita

texts.es:
Doña Emérita es una señora de 59 años que dedicó gran parte de su vida a laborar como maestra de primaria en un colegio del municipio de El Sauce por más de treinta años donde es bien reconocida por su carisma y paciencia que tuvo con sus niños de preescolar.
Doña Emérita se siente muy agradecida con Kiva y Ceprodel por el apoyo que le han brindado a lo largo de estos años porque gracias a estos financiamientos ha mejorado las condiciones de su vivienda y logró mejorar una parte de sus dientes en los cuales tiene problemas.
En este momento doña Emérita tiene la necesidad de otro financiamiento para terminar de mejorar su dentadura y espera y confía en Dios que le sigan apoyando, ya que esto créditos son de gran ayuda para las personas de escasos recursos.
texts.en:
Emérita, age 59, devoted a big part of her live to working as a primary school teacher for over 30 years at a school in the El Sauce municipality.  She is well-known there for her charisma and the patience that she had with pre-school children.

Emérita is very grateful to Kiva and CEPRODEL for the support they have given her through the years.  Thanks to these loans she has improved the condition of her house.  She managed to improve some of the teeth that have problems.

Emérita now needs another loan to finish improving her teeth.  She hopes and trusts in God that she will continue to be supported.  These loans are a great help to people with scarce resources.

loans.use: to have dental work done.

loans.name: Colleb

texts.en: Colleb has always counted on Ugafode to help with his tuition needs for his children. This being back-to-school season, Colleb is back to get a loan to pay for his children's tuition. He thanks the Kiva lenders for playing a big role in educating his children. He is very hard working and honest and he has maintained a strong bond with Ugafode because he repays his loans well.

loans.use: to pay tuition for his children.

loans.name: Juan Isaac

texts.es:
El cálido sol y el aire fresco del campo, son los que a diario le dan los buenos días a Juan, quién es agricultor. El tiene 34 años de edad, y tiene tres hijos. Hace 15 años inició a dedicarse a la siembra de maíz, frijol y trigo, actividades que se han convertido en su principal fuente de ingresos. Lo más importante para él es que la tierra esté en excelentes condiciones para que la siembra sea de calidad. Es un hombre emprendedor, inteligente y excelente padre.
La temporada de cosecha para los frijoles y el maíz se acercan, por lo tanto Juan solicita su segundo crédito, con el que planea hacer la compra de semillas de frijol y el abono para la fertilización de la siembra. Él está muy agradecido con el primer financiamiento de Kiva a través de MiCrédito, ya que logró realizar la siembra sin complicación y obtuvo buenas ganancias de ello,  las que invirtió en la salud y educación de sus hijos. Anhela aumentar la producción de cultivo este año, que le brinde más ganancias para ofrecerle mejores condiciones de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Every day the warm sun and the fresh air of the countryside are the things which greet Juan, who is a farmer. He is 34 years old and has three children. 

15 years ago he began to grow corn, beans and wheat, and this has become his main source of income. The most important thing for him is that the soil is in excellent condition so that it produces quality crops. He is an intelligent, entrepreneurial man and an excellent father. 

Harvest time for the beans and corn is approaching, so Juan is asking for his second loan, with which he plans to buy bean seeds and fertilizer to apply to the crops. 

He is very grateful for his first Kiva loan through MiCredito, as he was able to grow crops without any problems and make good profits from them, which he invested in the health and education of his children. 

He wishes to increase the crop production this year, to give him more profits to provide his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy bean seeds and fertilizer to apply to the crops.

loans.name: David Stalin

texts.es:
El Grupo de Crédito Estrella  Del Mar se reúne cada 15 días en el hermoso balneario de San Mateo en la ciudad de  Manta, conocido por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año por turistas nacionales y extranjeros, en  este lugar la mayoría de los habitantes se dedica a la pesca y a las faenas del mar.
En este lugar vive don David, tiene 44 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijas de 14 y 7 años que estudian en colegio y escuela. La mujer tiene un restaurante.
