El señor David y su esposa se dedican al comercio mientras él tiene un bar en un local cerca de su casa ella tiene un restaurante en la playa, en las mañanas y tardes él le ayuda a su mujer con su negocio ya que es la hora cuando mas clientes llegan al restaurante y en las noches él se encarga de su bar, el vende todos tipo de bebidas como aguas, colas, cervezas, etc. Su local es muy concurrido sobre todo por pescadores cuando llegan de alta mar y se entretienen en su local, el tiene 3 años su local mientras su esposa más de 13 años.
Este crédito es para comprar víveres para la preparación de los alimentos y bebidas para su bar. Está en el Grupo De Crédito desde hace 3 ciclos  y le gusta por la ayuda que recibe del grupo. Sus metas son seguir adelante en su negocio y darles una buena educación a sus hijas.
texts.en:
The Star of the Sea Credit Group meets every 15 days in the beautiful resort of San Mateo in the city of Manta, known for its beautiful beaches that are much-visited all year round by both foreign and domestic tourists. Most of the residents here are fishermen. 

David lives here. He is 44 years old, and he has a common-law marriage from which he has two daughters, ages 14 and 7, who are studying in high school and grade school. His wife has a restaurant.

David and his wife are in business—he has a bar near their house and she has a restaurant on the beach. In the mornings and afternoons he helps his wife with her business, as those are the times when the most customers come to the restaurant; and at night he manages his bar. He sells all kinds of beverages, such as waters, soft drinks, beers, etc. His bar is very popular, above all with the fishermen, who relax there when they return from the high seas. He has had his business for three years, while his wife has had hers for more than thirteen. 

This loan is for the purchase of supplies for the preparation of food and drinks for his bar. He has been in the credit group for three cycles, and he likes it because of the help that he receives from it. His goals are to make progress in his business and to provide his daughters with a good education.

loans.use: to purchase food supplies and beverages.

loans.name: Lilia

texts.en:
Lilia is 65 years old and lives in Poblacion, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. She is widowed, with three children who are now adults. 

Lilia has had a little store that sells groceries and other consumable products for five years already. She earns approximately 3,000 PHP each month doing this type of business. She has requested a loan to be used for purchasing groceries and other consumable products for her existing sari-sari (general) store. 

Lilia has been a member of PMPC for three years. In the future, Lilia hopes to expand her sari-sari store.

loans.use: To purchase groceries and other consumable products for her store

loans.name: Martin Emilio

texts.es: Martin es un agricultor de 39 años de edad que ha dedicado toda su vida y ser la campo, cultiva café, maíz, plátano y hortalizas actividad que aprendió de sus padres y hermanos y que con sus actitudes de comerciante perfecciono y potencio, sabe que como agricultor tiene una misión muy importante y no solo es la de mantener los gastos de su hogar, es cosechar productos de calidad  puesto que son productos que son consumidos cotidianamente. Solicita un crédito para la compra de una marquesina, una bomba para fumigar, semillas, fungicidas entre otros con los que quiere detener una plaga que está comenzando a brotar y proteger sus cultivos a futuro, su principal sueño es ampliar mucho más su negocio que más personas disfruten cada mañana de su café
texts.en: Martin is a 39-year-old farmer who has dedicated his whole life and being to the countryside.  He grows coffee, corn, bananas and vegetables, which he learned from his parents and siblings and which, with his business outlook, he perfected and strengthened.  He knows that as a farmer, he has a very important mission and not only does he need to provide for the household costs, but also provide excellent products to the people who consume them because they are products that we consume daily. He asks for this loan to purchase a traditional coffee-drying shelter, a pressure sprayer, seeds, and fungicides among other things with which he wants to stop an infestation that has begun to break out and protect the future of his crops. His primary dream is to expand his business a lot so more people can enjoy his coffee every morning.

loans.use: To purchase a traditional coffee-drying shelter, a pressure sprayer, seeds, pesticides, and fungicides with which he wants to expand his farm and offer coffee to more businesses

loans.name: Pedro Juan

texts.es:
Pedro tiene 44 años de edad, estudió hasta 4° año de educación Básica, dice no haber estudiado más porque para seguir la escuela quedaba a unos ocho kilómetros de la comunidad, en la actualidad  está acompañado, su esposa además de hacer los oficios domésticos le ayuda en el trabajo en el campo ella lo hace porque desde pequeña sus padres le enseñaron a trabajar y no se le dificulta, de los hijos solo uno está estudiando pues él es el único que depende totalmente de ellos.

Pedro se dedica a la agricultura es su negocio desde muy pequeño, el trabajo lo realiza a un kilómetro de su casa y 
lo hace a pie todos los días por berreras los caminos son bastantes escabrosos más en inviernos y en cuanto al 
apoyo que recibe solo el de su esposa ya que lo hace por amor a su familia.

El préstamo lo necesita para comprar seis sacos de fertilizantes para la siembra.


En un futuro él sueña con salir adelante con su familia y que no les falte nada.
texts.en:
Pedro, age 44, went to school through the fourth grade.  He says that he did not continue his education because the school was eight kilometers from his community.  He is currently in a relationship, and his wife, in addition to doing the household chores, helps him in the field.  She does this because her parents taught her to work when she was little, and it is not difficult for her.  Only one of his children goes to school.  He is the only one that is completely dependent upon them.

Pedro is a farmer.  Agriculture has been his business since he was very little.  He works one kilometer from his house.  He gets there by walking every day.  The obstacles along the way are pretty harsh, more in the winter.

The only support he gets is from his wife, and she does it from love for her family.

He needs the loan to buy six sacks of fertilizers for planting time.

In the future he dreams of getting ahead with his family and that they have everything they need.

loans.use: to buy six sacks of fertilizers.

loans.name: Santa

texts.es: Santa es una persona de 31 años de edad, viven en el municipio de Sololá, departamento de Sololá, es soltera, se dedica a cultivar papa, además del cultivo tiene una tienda de abarrotes (azúcar, maíz, arroz entre otros) que es donde obtiene sus ingresos, ella solicita un crédito por un monto de  Q. 3,000.00 que lo invierte en la compra semilla de papa y otros insumos, Santa es una persona muy creativa y quiere mejorar sus condiciones de vida, por eso instaló la tienda de abarrotes, el sueño de ella es ampliar y surtir mejor su tienda.
texts.en:
Santa, 31, lives in the municipality of Solola, department of Solola, and is single.  She makes a living growing potatoes.  Besides farming, she has a grocery shop (selling sugar, corn, and rice among other things) from which she obtains her income.

She requests a loan of 3,000 quetzals which she will invest in buying potato seeds and other supplies.  Santa is creative person and wants to improve her standard of living which is why she started the grocery shop.  Her dream is to expand and better stock her shop.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds and supplies

loans.name: Roumaldo

texts.es: Roumaldo es una persona de 45 años de edad, vive con su familia en el municipio de Sololá, departamento de Sololá, tiene 12 hijos, 9 de ellos son hombres y 3 mujeres, el obtiene sus ingresos en trabajos de albañilería, además se dedica al cultivo de hortalizas, cultiva arveja, zanahoria y papa, y los vende en el mercado del municipio, él solicita un préstamo por un monto de Q. 5,000.00 para invertirlo en la compra de semilla de arveja e insumos, Roumaldo trabaja arduamente para darles una mejor vida a su familia, el sueño de él es comprar un terreno para sus hijos tengan donde vivir.
texts.en:
Roumaldo is a 45 year old person living with his family in the city of Sololá in the department of Sololá. He has 12 children of which 9 are men and 3 are women. He earns his income from masonry work in addition to cultivating vegetables. He grows peas, carrots and potatoes and sells them in the city market.

He is requesting a loan of GTQ 5,000 to invest in buying pea seeds and supplies. Roumaldo works arduously to give his family a better life. His dream is to buy land for his children to have a place to live.

loans.use: to buy pea seeds and supplies

loans.name: Presidita

texts.en:
Presidita is 54 years old and lives in Magsaysay, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. She is the sole breadwinner of her four children, of whom three are now at their school age. 

Presidita has been engaged in a dried fish-vending business for almost several years already. She earns approximately PHP 3,000 each month doing this type of business activity. She has requested a loan to be used to purchase additional stocks of dried fish for retail. 

Presidita has been a member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) for almost one year. In the future, she hopes to expand her dried fish-vending business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of dried fish for retail.

loans.name: José Benjamín

texts.es:
José de 27 años de edad, comenta que él fue a la escuela 5 años, pero por motivos de trabajo nunca pudo terminar los años de estudio. Esta acompañado y su compañera tiene una pequeña tienda, sus hijos aun no estudian porque son menores. 

Él siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura pero antes sembraba maíz y fríjol, pero desde hace 2 años decidió probar suerte y vio que es más rentable el cultivo de sandía.

José tiene que caminar unos 3 km para llegar a su trabajo. El cliente necesita el dinero para comprar abono y venenos para su cultivo. También dice que el préstamo le ayudara mucho ya que no es fácil obtener una cierta cantidad de dinero trabajando en la agricultura, porque apenas saca para pagar  y tener la oportunidad el siguiente año de obtener otro préstamo y tener dinero para mantener a su familia. A él le gustaría que sus hijos sean profesionales o que tengan un buen negocio.

En la foto aparace en la tienda de su pareja, porque el cultivo no esta cerca y no podia transladarse hasta ese lugar para que se le tomara la foto.
texts.en:
José is 27 years old. He says that he went to school for 5 years, but because of work he was not able to finish school. He has a domestic partner and his partner has a small store. His children do not study because they are very young. He has always worked in agriculture. Before he used to grow corn and beans, but for the last 2 years he tried something else and saw that it was more profitable to grow watermelons. Jose has to walk around 3 kilometers to get to work. The client needs the money to buy fertilizers and pesticides for his crops. He also says that the loan will help him a lot since it is not easy to get a certain amount of money working in agriculture, because he barely earns to pay and to have the opportunity the following year to obtain another loan and to have money to support his family. He would like his children to be professionals or to have a good business. 

The client is shown in the store of his partner because his field is far away and he could not move to the location to take the picture.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticides for his crops.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta de 28 años de edad  es madre soltera vive con su hija en casa de su madre, ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas, tiene varios años con este trabajo y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le permite obtener los mejores resultados, su  negocio está ubicado en una zona muy estratégica y frecuentada por las personas de la comunidad, es muy conocida pues sus tortillas son las más ricas y siempre están calientitas, tiene mucha clientela y la buscan por su excelente calidad, buenos precios y sobre todo el servicio más rápido; en estos últimos meses ha aumentado la demanda y quiere aprovechar para aumentar su inversión pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, gas propano, etc. la clienta tiene buenas referencias de pago por parte de otras instituciones y se hace responsable del pago completo de la deuda, y a la vez tiene la esperanza que podrá darle a su hija una vida mejor.
texts.en:
The client is 28 years old, is a single mother living with her ​​daughter at her mother's home.  She sells tortillas and has been doing this for several years.  She has a lot of experience that allows her to get the best results.

Her business is located in a very strategic area frequented by people in the community and is well known for her tortillas as they are the richest and are always piping hot.  She has many customers who are looking for excellent quality, good prices and above all the fast service.

In recent months, she has had increased demand and wants to increase her business but does not have sufficient capital.  She has requested a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy corn wholesale, propane gas, etc.

The client has good references for payment to other institutions and is responsible for the full payment of the debt.  She also hopes to be able to give her daughter a better life.

loans.use: to buy corn wholesale, propane gas, etc.

loans.name: Rashad

texts.en:
Rashad is 39 years old, married, and has two children. They are an IDP (Internally Displaced Persons) from Fuzuli city, but now live in the Baku region. One of his children is 16 years old, and another child is 13 years old; both of them are going to secondary school. Rashad’s wife is a housewife. 

Rashad is a master; he makes stone columns. Rashad learned this profession from his uncle, and loves his job. 

Today he wants to buy equipment which is necessary for his business. Therefore, Rashad has applied for a loan in amount of 1100 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat). 

He say thanks to Kiva and its lenders for helping. 

In the future, he wants to hire an assistant.

loans.use: to buy equipment that is necessary for his business

loans.name: María Sara

texts.es: María tiene 61 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus dos hijos de 20 años y 28 años de edad. María es una mujer con espíritu emprendedor quien desde hace 6 años se dedica a la venta de tamales de pollo y es así como se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Actualmente no posee el servicio de energía eléctrica en su vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la instalación del servicio de energía eléctrica que tanta falta le hace.
texts.en: María is 61 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and two children aged 20 and 28. María is a woman with an entrepreneurial spirit who has been selling chicken tamales since she was 6 years old. This is how she makes a living and feeds her family. Currently she does not have electricity supplied to her home and so she is asking FUSAI for this loan for the installation of the electricity supply that she needs so badly.

loans.use: to pay for the installation of electricity in her house

loans.name: G.s Buenas Nuevas Group

texts.es:
Domitila se dedica al comercio su actividad principal es la venta de abarrotería,  cuenta con mas de 15 años de experiencia, negocio que le ha ayuda  a salir adelante, ya que los ingresos que obtiene de su negocio, contribuyen a salir adelante, con su familia, su negocio está ubicado en su casa de habitación,  sus principales clientes personas que viven en su barrio.
Doña Domitila está solicitando el préstamo para la compra de maíz, frijol, azúcar, manteca, pollo, carnes, lácteos, pan, café, jabón, detergente, cloro y otros productos para la buena atención de sus clientes,  ella generalmente vende la abarrotería al contado,  el crédito anterior lo utilizo para surtir mas su negocio, lo cual le genero mas ganancias, ella sueña de nuevo con tener más surtido su negocio de venta de abarrotería en general,  y contar con más clientes, , ella está solicitando el préstamo de manera grupal con las siguientes personas; 
Blanca se dedica al comercio, su actividad principal es la venta de abarrotería (pulpería) ella cuenta con  25 años de experiencia3
Sandra se dedica al comercio y su actividad principal es la venta de ropa y zapatos, ella cuenta con 4 años de experiencia.
Elsi se dedica al comercio su actividad principal es  la venta de abarrotería (pulpería ) ella cuenta con 5 años de experiencia.
Diana  se dedica al comercio su actividad principal es la venta de bloques, ella cuenta con 2 años de experiencia.
Danlí El Paraíso, Honduras Abril 2014
texts.en:
Domitila works in sales.  Her main job is selling groceries; she has more than 10 years of experience.  This business has helped her to get by, because the income that she gets from the business helps her to get ahead with her family.  Her business is located in her house.  Her main customers are people who live in her neighborhood.

Doña Domitila is asking for a loan to buy corn, beans, sugar, lard, chicken, meat, dairy products, bread, coffee, soap, detergent, bleach, and other products.  In order to give good service to her customers, she usually makes her sales in cash.  She used her previous loan to better stock her business, which generated improved earnings for her.  She dreams of restocking her grocery business and having more customers.  She is asking for this loan along with a group that includes the following people:

Blanca, who works in sales.  Her main job is sales in a small grocery store.  She has 25 years of experience.

Sandra, who works in sales.  Her main job is selling clothing and shoes.  She has four years of experience.

Elsi, work works in sales.  Her main job is sales in a small grocery store.  She has five years of experience.

Diana, who works in sales.  Her main job is selling blocks.  She has two years of experience.

-Danli El Paraíso, Honduras.  April 2014

loans.use: to buy corn, beans, sugar, lard, chicken, meat, dairy products, bread, coffee, soap, detergent, bleach, and other products for her business.

loans.name: Marie Lee

texts.en:
Marie Lee is 40 years old and lives in Salimpono, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. She is married, with three children who are now at their school age. 

Marie Lee has been engaged in a pottery retailing business for almost two years already. At present, she is an elected Barangay official in the community. She earns approximately PHP 8,000 each month doing this type of business activity. 

She has requested a loan to be used to purchase additional stocks of  pots to sell. 

Marie Lee has been a member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) for almost three years. In the future, she hopes to expand her pot-selling business to other nearby cities and provinces.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of pottery to sell.

loans.name: Phebe

texts.en:
Phebe is 71 years old and lives in Tabo-o, Jimenez,  Misamis Occidental. She is widowed with five children who are now adults. 

Phebe has been engaged in a rice palay trading business for 10 years. She earns approximately PHP 4,000 each month doing this type of business activity. At present, she is also receiving a monthly pension. 

She has requested a loan to be used for purchasing an additional 20 sacks of rice palay for drying, milling and selling.

Phebe has been a member of PMPC for almost 14 years.

In the future she hopes to expand her existing business.

loans.use: To purchase an additional 20 sacks of rice palay for drying, milling and selling

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia is 60 years old and lives in Poblacion, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. She is widowed with three adult children. 

Alicia is engaged in a food processing and vending business for 10 years, specifically viand and snacks. Alicia earns approximately PHP 2,000 each month doing this type of business activity. 

She has requested a loan to be used for purchasing more meat, ingredients, spices and other seasonings for her food processing and vending business. 

Alicia has been a member of PMPC for almost 10 years. 

In the future, Alicia hopes to expand her business by making additional food products to sell.

loans.use: to purchase more meat, ingredients, spices and other seasonings

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more charcoal and other food items for her business.

loans.name: Loreta

texts.en:
Loreta is 59 years old and lives in Salimpono, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. She is widowed with four children who are now adults. 

Loreta has a little store that sells groceries and other consumable products; she has been doing this for several years already. Loreta earns approximately PHP 2,000 each month doing this type of business activity. 

She has requested a loan to be used for purchasing groceries and other consumable products for the re-opening of her sari sari store. 

Loreta has been a member of PMPC for almost 12 years.

 In the future, she hopes to expand her sari-sari store business.

loans.use: To be used for purchasing groceries and other consumable products

loans.name: Milagros

texts.en:
Milagros is 58 years old and a single parent with one child. She lives in Calamba. 

She has been engaged in fish-selling for 35 years, with a monthly income of PHP 12,000 doing this type of job. She joined Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative because she wants to sell a different variety of fish.

Milagros applied a loan to purchase additional stocks of fish to sell. She plans to purchase a fish carrier in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of fish to sell.

loans.name: Teodulo

texts.es:
Teodulo de 34 años de edad estudio hasta 1° grado debido a que él era el primero de su familia de 5 hermanos y tenia que trabajar para ayudar a sus padres, esta acompañado su compañera se dedica al cuido de su hogar,  tres de sus hijos estudian así esta compuesto su hogar.


Teodulo se dedica a la agricultura desde que tenia 10 años,  oficio que aprendió de sus padres actualmente trabaja en un cañal desde 5 años,  para llegar a su trabajo tiene que caminar 30 minutos su día de trabajo comienza a la 4:30 AM su jornada es de 7 horas diarias en la tarde se dedica a su trabajo.


El crédito sera invertido, para comprar abono, semillas, herbicidas, pesticidas, fertilizantes y pago de mano de obra para preparar la tierra, en donde cultivara.  

Teodulo sueña en que sus hijos estudien y construir su propia casa de ladrillo y poder cancelar su crédito con puntualidad.

Esa leña esta ubicada en a la par de su casa y la utiliza para el consumo familiar no para la venta. Se tomo ahi la foto, porque el cultivo no lo tiene aún para eso solicita el crédito.
texts.en:
Teodulo, age 34, studied through the first grade, due to the fact that he is the eldest of five children in his family and he had to work to help his parents.  He is in a long-term relationship; his partner works taking care of the home.  Three of his children are students.  This is how his household is composed.

Teodulo has worked in agriculture since he was ten years old.  He learned this line of work from his parents.  At this point in time, he has worked in a sugarcane field for five years.  In order to get to work he has to walk 30 minutes.  His workday begins at 4:30 a.m. and his shift lasts seven hours.  In the afternoons he does his own work.

This loan will be invested in the purchase of manure, seeds, herbicides, pesticides, and fertilizers, and to pay for the labor to prepare the soil where he will plant.

Teodulo dreams that his children will keep studying, and that he will build his own brick house.  He also dreams of being able to pay off his loan on time.

The wood in the picture is used for family consumption and not for sale. He took the photo here because his crop was not yet harvested.

loans.use: to buy manure, seeds, herbicides, pesticides, and fertilizers, and to pay for the labor to prepare the land he will cultivate.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy an embroidery machine, a sewing machine, and an iron.

loans.name: Armando Ricardo

texts.en:
Armando (on the right of the photo) is 32 years old and newly married with no children. He has been a government employee for five and a half years now, working in the equivalent of the IRS in the Mexican Treasury Department. There within the taxpayers’ service area he works in developing the way tax payers use Mexico’s dependency services. Among his hobbies he enjoys reading and outdoor sports.

Armando is applying for a 20,000 MXN loan through Kubo Financiero to buy furniture and appliances for the house he has just moved into with his wife.

loans.use: to buy furniture and appliances for his house

loans.name: Pacita

texts.en: Pacita is married with 8 adult age children. She lives in Calamba-Sepac, Sapang Dalaga Misamis Occiental, Philippines.  She has been engaged in a sari-sari store for 1 year.  She joined Paglaum 9 years ago and is applying for a loan in the amount of 6,000 PHP to add to her existing stock.  she has a monthly income of 3,000 PHP from the business.  The profit she will earn from her business will be saved at Paglaum for retirement purposes.

loans.use: buy additional stock for her store

loans.name: Mercy Gay

texts.en:
Mercy Gay is 31 years old and married with 3 children.  She operates a sari-sari store in Poblacion, Sibutad. 
She signed up for membership in Paglaum in 2013. Recently she applied a loan to purchase additional goods like canned goods, laundry soap, oil and sugar.

Mercy Gay is saving for her children's education.

loans.use: to purchase additional goods like canned goods, laundry soap, oil and sugar

loans.name: Victoriano

texts.es: Victoriano es una persona de 39 años de edad, vive con su familia en el municipio de Sololá, departamento de Sololá, tiene 4 hijos, tres hombres, todos asistente en la escuela y 1 mujer tiene 1 mes de edad, Se dedica a la agricultura, cultiva zanahoria, frijol y cebolla, de la venta de estos cultivos obtiene sus ingresos, los conocimientos los aprendió de su papá, Victoriano solicita un préstamos por un monto Q. 3,000.00 para comprar semilla de frijol y cebolla, él en el futuro piensa abrir una cuenta de ahorro en un banco, Victoriano es una persona muy trabajador y quiera darles una mejor condición de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Victoriano, 39, lives with his family in the municipality of Sololá, Department of Sololá. He has 4 children, 3 sons who all go to school and a one-month-old daughter. He is a farmer. He grows carrots, beans and onions. He derives his income from the sale of these crops. He learned this trade from his father.

Victoriano is requesting a loan of 3,000.00 Guatemalan quetzal to purchase bean and onion seeds. In the future he plans to open a savings account. Victoriano is a very hard worker and he wants to provide his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase bean seeds and supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to set up a poultry farm and buy animals to start his dream of being a micro-businessman.

loans.name: Mely

texts.en:
Mely is 49 years old and lives in Poblacion, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. She is married with 4 children, both adult and school age. 
Mely is engaged in the snack vending business, particularly fish balls, squid rolls, tempura and salted peanuts for the last 20 years. She earns approximately PHP 3,000.00 each month doing this type of business activity. She has requested a loan to purchase 20 packs of tempura, 20 packs of squid roll and ingredients for fish balls. 
Mely has been a member of PMPC for almost 2 years. In the future, Mely hopes to expand her snack vending activity to other nearby towns.

loans.use: To purchase 20 packs of tempura, 20 packs of squid roll and ingredients for fish balls

loans.name: Hermecita

texts.en:
Hermecita is 41 years old and lives in Corrales, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married with five children who are now at their school age. 

Hermecita had a little store and has been selling groceries and other consumable products for four years already. She earns approximately PHP 1,000 each month doing this type of business activity. 

She has requested a loan to be used in purchasing additional groceries and other consumable products for retail. 

Hermecita has been a member of PMPC for three years. In the future, Hermecita hopes to expand her sari-sari store business.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries and other consumable products for retail.

loans.name: Maria Fe

texts.en:
Maria Fe is 47 years old, single and has a wood retail business in SWP.  
She is a new member of PMPC and has applied for a loan to finance her business. She wants to buy lumber to resell. As her business is earning a promising income, she wants to sustain her business and be able to support the education of her niece.

loans.use: to buy lumber to resell

loans.name: Merlyn

texts.en:
Merlyn is 30 years old and lives in Corrales, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married with 2 school age children. 
Merlyn is engaged in farming activity, particularly in vegetable gardening for the last 4 years and earns approximately PHP 1,500.00 each month doing this type of business activity. She has requested a loan to purchase commercial fertilizer for her gardening activity. 
Merlyn has been a member of PMPC for 4 years. In the future, Merlyn hopes to engage in other types of business.

loans.use: To purchase commercial fertilizer for her gardening activity

loans.name: Elxan

texts.en:
Elxan is 28 years old, married and has a child. He is an IDP (Internally Displaced Persons) from his former home in Kalbajar city, and is now living in the Baku region with his family. In business for over five years, Elxan is a master tradesman, skilled at hanging wallpaper, puttying, plastering, constructing plastic doors and windows,  etc.

In order to increase his business, Elxan has applied for a loan in the amount of 800 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat) to buy more construction materials. He expresses deep gratitude to the Kiva organization and all lenders who help. 

In the future, Elxan wants to hire an assistant to further develop his business.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Clemente

texts.en:
Clemente is 45 years old and is very responsible with his household obligations since he has always been known to provide the best for his family. He currently lives with his wife and seven children. He is a farmer who grows corn and vegetables.

Clemente wants to increase his sales. Consequently, he has requested a loan that will enable him to purchase seeds, compost and fertilizer, among other items, so that he can continue to put bread on the table in his home.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, compost and fertilizer

loans.name: Alba Dinora

texts.es:
Alba tiene 40 años de edad, estudió primer grado, está casada, su pareja trabaja en la agricultura desde que era muy pequeño, tiene cuatro hijos, los tres más grandes van a la escuela y viven con ellos.


Ella es ama de casa, pero también se dedica a la agricultura, junto a su esposo realiza los trabajos de la tierra, siendo ella una mujer luchadora, desde pequeña su padre la llevaba a los cultivos ya que no habían hermanos barones grandes para que le ayudaran, la parcela donde trabajan está  a un kilómetro de su casa, el recorrido lo hace a pie.

El préstamo será invertido en la preparación de la  tierra para la siembra, en la compra de insumos y en el pago de la mano de obra.

Sueña con tener lo más necesario para la familia, por lo que espera trabajar siempre mientras Dios le regale salud y vida, el préstamo le ayudará en satisfacer la necesidad del arrendamiento de la tierra, la compra de los insumos.
texts.en:
Alba is 40 years old and studied until first grade. She is married and her husband is a farmer, work he has been doing since he was very young. She has 4 children, the three eldest go to school and all the children live with her.

She is a homemaker and also helps her husband on the land. She is a woman with a fighting spirit. Since she was young her parents would bring her to the crops because she didn't have older brothers to help them out. She walks to the plot where she works which is a kilometer from her house.

The loan will be invested in the preparation of the land for cultivation, the purchase of supplies and payment for labour.

She dreams of meeting her family’s needs for which she hopes to always work as long as God provides her with good health and life. The loan will help her in the lease of the land and to purchase supplies.

loans.use: to prepare the land for cultivation and to purchase farming supplies.

loans.name: Madiina

texts.en: Madiina, a single mother of 3 children does everything to sustain her family and meet all their needs. Now she is into the produce trade, this being a harvest season. If given a financial boost in form of a loan she will be able to earn more profit since she will be buying cheaply and supplying many customers making her turnover higher than it is at present. She is hard working and honest.

loans.use: To buy agricultural products for trade

loans.name: Beatris

texts.es: Beatriz tiene 70 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto  a su esposo. Beatriz se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva desde hace mucho tiempo en las principales zonas de su localidad. Es una mujer trabajadora quien hace todo lo que este en sus manos para llevar el sustento a su familia.  Beatriz ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de variedad de ropa como faldas, pantalones, blusas, ropa interior ect. De esta forma espera satisfacer a un grupo mayor de clientes que le permita aumentar sus ventas e ingresos ya así poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia.
texts.en: Beatriz is 70 years old and lives in her own house with her husband. Beatriz has worked selling new clothes for a long time in the main areas of her town. She is a hardworking woman who does everything she can to support her family. Beatriz has decided to ask for this loan from FUSAI to invest in buying a variety of clothing, such as skirts, pants, blouses, underwear, etc. In this way, she hopes to satisfy a larger group of customers so she can increase her sales and income and thus improve her and her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy skirts, pants, blouses, underwear, etc.

loans.name: Lidia

texts.pt:
Tem 55 anos de idade, vive maritalmente e é a segunda esposa do seu marido, tem 8 filhos maiores de idade 5 dos quais ainda na sua responsabilidade e a estudarem, ela estudou ate 3ª classe, vive de negócio a muitos anos, tem um mercearia dentro do mercado e emprega 2 trabalhadores que lhe ajudam, esta a repetir pela 5ª vez o credito, no primeiro teve azar de sofrer incêndio na sua barraca  e perder quase toda mercadoria que tinha, mas mesmo assim conseguiu devolver o credito na totalidade e pedir mais.
Ela pretende comprar: farinha, açúcar, feijão, manteiga, arroz, óleo, palones, yougurts, queijo, refrescos, sumos, vinhos, cervejas, etc, para aumentar o seu stock.
Ela tem a esperança de poder aumentar o seu stock e adquirir uma viatura que lhe possa ajudar no transporte da sua mercadoria.
Seu maior desafio é o facto de sofrer muitos roubos no seu estabelecimento e que o governo nada faz para resolver o problema.
texts.en:
Lidia is 55 years old and married. She's her husband's second wife. She has eight adult children, five of whom are still in school and under her responsibility. She completed 3rd grade and has earned a livelihood from her business for several years. She owns a grocery store at the market and she employs two people to help her. This is her 5th loan. With the first loan, she had the misfortune of suffering a fire in her booth and losing almost all of the merchandise she had. Even so, she repaid the loan in its entirety and applied for more.
She intends to purchase flour, sugar, beans, butter, rice, cooking oil, bologna, yogurt, cheese, refreshments, juice, wine, beer, etc., in order to stock up.
Her hope is to be able to stock up and acquire a vehicle that can help her carry her merchandise.
Her biggest challenge is the fact that she faces a great deal of theft in her store, and the government does nothing to solve the problem.

loans.use: to purchase flour, sugar, beans, butter, rice, cooking oil, bologna, yogurt, cheese, refreshments, juice, wine, beer, etc., in order to stock up.

loans.name: Heisy Georgina

texts.es: Heisy es una joven madre de dos hijos, trabaja en una institución privada, con mucho esfuerzo ha podido salir adelante, actualmente está por culminar su carrera de Ing. en Sistemas, razón por la cual solicita el crédito para poder pagar el curso de titulación que le permitirá ejercer su carrera aspirando a un mejor empleo
texts.en:
Heisy is the young mother of two children.  She works at a private institution.  With much effort she has been able to get ahead.  She is currently completing her degree in systems engineering.

That is the reason that she is requesting the loan.  With the loan she will be able to pay for licensing and registration requirements so that she may practice her profession.  She wishes to have a better job.

loans.use: to pay for licensing and registration requirements.

loans.name: Leonisa

texts.en:
Leonisa is 59 years old and lives in Culo, Molave, Zamboanga del Sur. She is married with two children.

Leonisa has a furniture shop business and earns approximately PHP (10,000) each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan for additional capital to buy some materials for her furniture. 

Leonisa has been a member of PMPC for five years. In the future, she hopes to give more financial support to her two children someday.

loans.use: to pay for furniture materials.

loans.name: Paulina

texts.en: Paulina is married with 4 children. Paulina is 59 years old and lives in Locsoon,Tudela, Philippines. Paulina sells charcoal to earn a living and has had this business for 20 years. Each month, she earns 10,000 PHP doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 50,000 PHP to finance her charcoal business and to purchase additional housing materials. Paulina has been a member of PMPC for 9 years. In the future, Paulina hopes to financially support her immediate family members.

loans.use: to finance her charcoal business and to purchase additional housing materials

loans.name: Andrés Alexander

texts.es:
Andrés de 25 años de edad, estudio noveno grado por las condiciones económicas de su familia se le imposibilito continuar, es acompañado su esposa se dedica a trabajar como domestica cuidando dos niños. Son padres de  una niña que aún no estudia, con él vive sus padres y dos hermanos,  su hija y su compañera de vida. De él  dependen su esposa y su hija.
   

Andrés hace unos meses ingreso a la fuerza armada.  Tiene aproximadamente 4 meses que ingreso,  fue por iniciativa propia que se fue porque cuando era pequeño así lo había pensado. También recibe remesas que le envían sus familiares, antes se dedica a trabajar como obrero en un taller de estructuras metálicas donde hacían puertas, ventanas, construían techos. El lugar donde trabaja le queda a 25 km de su casa y viaja en bus para llegar.
Trabaja de 6 de la mañana a 4 y luego descansa.


El cliente con el financiamiento pagara un dinero que debe, y con el resto comprara una parte del material que ocupa para terminar una habitación que está construyendo. Con el crédito podrá cumplir su sueño de vivir sin deudas y en un lugar más cómoda.

   Su sueño es legalizar un terreno que le dieron sus padres y en seguida construir una vivienda  para vivir más cómodo y en privacidad con su familia, todo esto lo va lograr con el salario que recibe mensualmente y apoyado por su esposa.
texts.en:
Andrés is 25 years old and studied up to Grade 9. Due to the financial situation of his family it was impossible to continue his studies. He is in a common-law relationship and his wife works as domestic labor, taking care of children. They are parents to a daughter who does not yet go to school. His parents, two siblings, his wife and daughter all live with him. His wife and daughter are dependent on him.

A few months ago Andrés joined the armed forces. It's been about 4 months since he joined. It was something he wanted to do since he was small. He also gets remittances from family members. He worked as a laborer in a metal fabrication company where they made doors, windows and roofs. The place where he worked was 25 km from his house and he traveled there by bus. He worked from 6 in the morning until 4 pm and then rested.

Andrés will use the loan to pay off a debt he has and with the rest he will buy part of the material he needs to finish the room he is building. With the loan he can fulfill his dream of living without debt and in a more comfortable house. His dream is to legalize the land that his parents left him and then build a house to live in comfortably and in privacy with his family. He can achieve this with his monthly salary and the aid of his wife.

loans.use: to pay off some money he owes and with the rest buy material to finish a room he is building.

loans.name: Ahlam* Group

texts.en:
Ahlam* is a group comprised of four women from Sana'a, Yemen. They are requesting a loan of 160,000 YER from AMB.

Ahlam is the leader of the group. She is a 30-year-old divorced woman with two children. Her older child is five years old and the younger one is only one year old. Ahlam's husband immigrated to Saudi Arabia and her brothers are also in that country. Her husband sends money for his children and Ahlam's brothers send her with money, too, from Saudi Arabia. The money her brothers send  her is not enough to cover all the expenses of the family. Ahlam says that her house lacks many home appliances, and she can't afford this. Unfortunately, Ahlam doesn't have enough money to furnish the house. For this reason, Ahlam is requesting a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase a bed for her home.

Ahlam looks forward to improving the condition of her children. Her dreams for the future are to furnish her house with new furniture and home appliances. She hopes to open a saving account in AMB.

loans.use: to purchase a bed for her home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase biodigesters for resale

loans.name: Mary Ann

texts.en:
Mary Ann is married with eight (8) children. Mary Ann is forty one (41) years old and lives in Bogo Capalaran, Molave Zamboanga del Sur.

Mary Ann sells dry goods, candles, soft drinks, assorted groceries, rice, feeds, etc. to earn a living, and has had this business for eleven (11) years. Each month, she earns PHP 30,000 doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of PHP 50,000 to buy dry goods, candles, soft drinks, assorted groceries, rice, feeds, etc.

Mary Ann has been a member of PMPC for five (5) years. In the future, Mary Ann hopes to improve her lifestyle doing her business, and especially hopes that she can earn more profit.

loans.use: To buy dry goods, candles, soft drinks, assorted groceries, rice, feeds, etc.

loans.name: Marie Grace

texts.en:
Marie Grace is 33 years of age and lives in Brgy. Maloloy-on Molave Zamboanga Del Sur. She is married with three children.
To earn a living, Marie Grace has a fast-food business. She earns about 30,000 PHP each month doing this type of work. Marie Grace has requested a loan of 50,000 PHP to buy new kitchen utensils, meat, spices and ingredients for the customers. Marie Grace has been a member of Paglaum MPC for almost a month. In the future, Marie Grace would like to give more financial support to her three children.

loans.use: To buy new kitchen utensils, meat, spices and ingredients for her restaurant.

loans.name: Malahat

texts.en:
Malahat is a 49-year-old refugee. She is married and has a daughter and two sons. Her husband is a laborer and they live in an IDP (Internally Displaced Persons) settlement. Their main source of income is farming. Malahat has been raising and selling seasonal vegetables and wheat for 24 years. She has good skills in this area, and her monthly income is 280 AZN.

Wheat is in high demand because people buy flour products every day. They buy vegetables in order to make delicious dishes from them. Malahat supplies vegetables and wheat to local cafés and bazaars.

Malahat’s income doesn’t cover the family’s demands. She applied for 1500 AZN in order to buy good fertilizers for vegetables and wheat. This will increase the harvest and income of the family, and she will be able to pay for her children’s education.

loans.use: to buy good fertilizers for vegetables and wheat.

loans.name: G.s.  Mujeres Unidas Group

texts.es:
El g.s.  Mujeres Unidas está conformada por tres mujeres, madres solteras  responsables con, con seis hijos bajo su responsabilidad. Son originarias del Sauce, lugar que está ubicado en la zona de occidente de país, se caracterizan por ser trabajadores, responsables, con ganas de superación personal. En sus ratos libre le gusta disfruta de la compañía de sus hijos. Lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos no pudieron estudiar,  y se vieron en la necesidad de trabajar desde temprana edad para ayudar con los gastos del hogar. En la actualidad luchan día día para brindarles un futuro mejor a sus hijos.
Gracias a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante la cordinadora es Maria Benita y tiene por actividad económica una pulpería es una pequeña tienda que vende productos comestibles como: arroz, frijoles, azúcar, fósforos, jugos, gaseosas, pan, huevos, crema. Ella dedica a su negocio unas doce horas diarias ofreciendo su producto. El  objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio, para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos. G.S, Mujeres Unidas agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva le brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
The Solidarity Group  Mujeres Unidas [Women United] is made up of three unmarried women who, between them, are responsible for six children. They are from Sauce, located in the western part of the country. They are responsible, hard-workers with a strong desire for personal improvement. In their free time they enjoy being with their children.

Unfortunately, due to lack of financial resources they were unable to attend school and had to work starting at a young age to help the family with household expenses. Currently, they struggle day to day to provide a better future for their children. 

Thanks to her hard work and her desire to get ahead, Maria Benita has established a small grocery store that sells items such as rice, beans, sugar, matches, juices, soft drinks, bread, eggs, and cream. She spends 12 hours a day selling her products.  The purpose of the loan is to invest in working capital to stock up the business so that in the not-too-distant future she will be able to earn more income. 

The Solidarity Group Mujeres Unidas appreciates the help that Kiva investors provide to people of limited financial resources and to poor countries such as Nicaragua so that they may have a dignified way to earn a living.

loans.use: to invest in working capital to supply her grocery store with such items as rice, beans, sugar, matches, juices, soft drinks, bread, eggs, and cream.

loans.name: Aisha

texts.en: Aisha lives in Kampala. She is married with one child who goes to school.  She takes care of three additional family members (old parents and brother). She operates a canteen at the school on a retail basis from the market. She has been in business for the last four years. She works seven days a week. She has requested a loan of 500,000 Ugandan shillings to buy sweets, biscuits, sweet bananas, cigarettes, soap and sugar. Her business challenges include transportation and seasonality. Her goal and aspiration is to buy a fridge so as to serve cold drinks. She lives in a rented house and the family has access to electricity but does not have access to piped water. Her major monthly expenses include school fees and medication.

loans.use: To buy sweets, biscuits, sweet bananas, bread, soap and cakes

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en: Sarah lives in Kampala. She is married with four children, three of whom go to school.  She takes care of two additional family members (old parents). She has a restaurant. She has been in this business for the last 10 years. She works seven days a week. She gets additional income from selling piped water. She has requested a loan of 400,000 Ugandan shillings to buy rice, cooking oil, sweet potatoes, flour, and a bunch of green bananas. Her business challenges include transportation and seasonality. Her goal and aspiration is to buy a delivery van to make transportation easier and also to get more capital so as to serve more customers. She lives in her own house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her major monthly expenses include school fees.

loans.use: To buy more  rice, cooking oil, sweet potatoes, flour and a bunch of green bananas.

loans.name: Florence

texts.en: Florence lives in Kampala. She is divorced with four children, three of whom go to school.  She takes care of one additional family member (her mother). She sells second-hand clothes on a retail basis from the market. She has been in business for the last eight years. She works seven days a week.  She has requested a loan of 500,000 Ugandan shillings to buy a bale of second-hand clothes. Her business challenges include transportation and seasonality. Her goal and aspiration is to buy a delivery van and also to get more capital so as to become a wholesaler. She lives in a rented house and the family has access to electricity but does not have access to piped water. Her major monthly expenses include rent and school fees.

loans.use: To buy a bale of used clothes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy used clothes for her business.

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
Alma is 37 years old and lives in Culo, Molave, Zamboanga del Sur. She is married with two children.

Alma has a mini junk shop business and earns approximately PHP 10,000 each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan for additional capital to buy junk metal, plastic and other materials.

Alma has been a member of PMPC for four years. In the future, she hopes to improve her business and engage in another business to support and give a good future to her children.

loans.use: to pay for junk metal, plastic and other materials.

loans.name: Adelaida

texts.en:
Adelaida is 54 years old, married and has five children. Adelaida is a member in good standing with the cooperative for nine years and has taken several loans already. She has a snack vending business to earn a living. Recently, she applied for a loan to purchase raw ingredients.
Adelaida is happy to see all her children finish their studies.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients for snack vending

loans.name: Fe

texts.en: Fe is 59 years old and lives in Baybay, Kolambugan, Lanao Del Norte. She is widow with five adult-age children. Fe has a mini-grocery store business. She has had this business for twenty-five years. She requested a loan to restock the store with basic commodities.  Fe has been a member of PMPC for one year.  In the future Fe hopes to improve her living conditions and the financial status of her family.

loans.use: To restock her store with basic commodities

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en: Rosita is 59 years old and lives in Labo Ozamiz. Rosita has only one child and is separated from her husband, but she never gives up and she continues striving for the sake of her son. Rosita is very happy and thankful as a member of Paglaum to receive financial assistance. She applied for a loan to buy housing materials for her house renovation.

loans.use: to buy housing materials for her house renovation

loans.name: Resba

texts.en:
This is Resba. Her previous loan was a big help in her business. She was able to buy more shop items. She has been in this business for years now, and it keeps on growing. 

She would like to apply for another loan, this time to buy more stock of household consumables, wheat flour, maize flour, rice and sugar. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

loans.use: to buy more stock of household consumables, wheat flour, maize flour, rice and sugar.

loans.name: Juhaje

texts.en:
Juhaje is a very hardworking and enterprising woman who says that she has been able to greatly increase her income and help her family, thanks to her hard work.

Juhaje operates a charcoal selling business as well as a goat selling business,

She is asking for a loan to buy more sacks of charcoal for her business. She is grateful for the new support she has received.

loans.use: to buy more charcoal for her business.

loans.name: Dina

texts.es:
Dina tiene 50 años d edad, estudió hasta quinto grado, está acompañada, su pareja trabaja la tierra es agricultor y también cuida ganado.

Ella tiene una tiende en la que vende todo lo necesario para la cocina (arroz, frijoles azúcar, café aceite, etc.), ya tiene cinco años de realizar esta actividad, la necesidad la llevó a iniciar una fuente de ingreso extra, por lo que decidió poner la tienda como un ingreso que lo podía realizar desde la casa, no tiene otra actividad a la que se dedique, la tienda la tiene en su casa por lo que no tiene que recorrer distancias, sus dos hijas le ayudan a vender, el horario de atención es de 6 am a 8 pm. 


El préstamo será invertido en el negocio, para comprar más productos para la venta, ya que tiene bastante demanda de la gente que vive alrededor, la mejora que tendrá, es el poderle ofrecer mayor variedad de producto a los clientes.



Los sueños que tiene es poder crecer siempre en las ventas y con eso tener mejores ingresos, con lo que se da a conocer cada vez más, el préstamo le ayudara en satisfacer la necesidad de ampliar el negocio,  la ganancia de la tienda será invertido en el pago de la cuota, y en el sustento de su familia.
texts.en:
Dina is 50 years old; she studied up to the fifth grade. She has a partner who works the land as a farmer and also takes care of cattle.

She has a store where she sells everything necessary for the kitchen (rice, beans, sugar, coffee, oil, etc). She has been doing this activity for five years. It was necessity that drove her find a new means of earning extra money, which is why she decided to set up the store as income that she could manage from her home. She doesn't have another activity that she dedicates herself to. The store is in her house so she doesn't have to travel. Her two daughters help her with sales, and business hours are from 6am to 8pm. 

The loan will be invested in the business, to buy more products to sell since she has a large demand from the people who live nearby. The improvement that she will have is the ability to offer greater product variety to her customers.

Her dreams are to always increase her sales and through that have larger earnings which will allow her to be better known. The loan will help to satisfy her need to grow her business. The store’s earnings will be used to pay back the loan and to provide for her family.

loans.use: to buy more products for her store.

loans.name: Rodolfo Arturo

texts.es:
Rodolfo tiene 62 años de edad, estudió hasta cuarto grado, está casado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos, y es quien se encarga del cuidado de los animales de corral, tienen 5 que colaboran con el trabajo en la agricultura.

Rodolfo se dedica a la agricultura, ya tiene más de 25 años de dedicarse a la actividad productiva, su padre fue quien le enseñó a valorar lo que es el trabajo, dándole como ejemplo la vida que él había tenido, donde solo trabajando y cuidando la familia podía vivir tranquilo, por el tipo de actividad de la zona es que se dedican solamente a la agricultura.

El préstamo será invertido en la preparación de la  tierra para la siembra, hoy que viene la época de invierno, con el apoyo de sus hijos no invierte en personas que le ayuden, pero si en el arrendamiento de la tierra.

Sueña con seguir luchando por su familia y que Dios le de vida para poder lograrlo.
texts.en:
Rodolfo is 62 years old. He studied up until fourth grade, and is married. His wife does housework, and is the one who is in charge of caring for the barnyard animals. They have five people who help with the agricultural work.

Rodolfo makes a living in agriculture. He has already been doing this work for more than 25 years. His father was the one who taught him the value of work, using his own life as an example, in which he could only live peacefully if he worked and took care of the family, since in this area agriculture is the only type of work that they do.

The loan will be invested in the preparation of the land for harvest, now that the winter season is coming. With the help of his children, he does not have to invest in people to help him, but he does have to rent the land. He dreams of continuing to fight for his family and that God will let him live long enough to be able to achieve this dream.

loans.use: to prepare the land where he will plant his crops

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothes and footwear for sale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more used clothes and others items for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more peanut, cassava, plantain, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy rice, oil, salt, onion, meat, and fish for her restaurant

loans.name: Pablo

texts.es:
Pablo tiene 78 años de edad, estudió hasta segundo grado, el recibió enseñanza de aprendizaje en una casa, no habían escuelas en ese entonces, lo que lo limitó a quedarse solo con lo necesario para leer y escribir, está casado y su esposa es ama de casa, ella es la que se encarga de las labores del hogar, sus hijos ya formaron sus propios hogares.

Él es agricultor, tiene más de 40 años de realizar la actividad, su padre desde pequeño le enseñó este trabajo, también tiene tres vacas que le dan leche, la distancia que recorre es corta donde tiene la parcela de trabajo, por lo que el recorrido lo hace a pie, el horario de trabajo es de 6:00 AM a 11 AM. 


El crédito lo necesita para comprar una ternera, con lo que mejorara sus ingresos  y podrá ampliar la producción.


Pablo sueña que todo lo que ha trabajado sea para sus hijos por los que tanto ha luchado, ya que la edad que tiene ya no le permite trabajar como antes.
texts.en:
Pablo is 78 years old. He studied up until second grade, and was taught from the lessons learned in the home. There were no schools in that period, which limited him to attaining only the tools necessary to read and write. 

He is married, and his wife is a housewife. She is the one who is in charge of the work in the home. Their children have already formed their own homes. He is a farmer, and has been doing this work for more than 40 years. His father taught him this work starting when he was young. 

He also has three cows that provide him with milk. The distance he has to cover to get to his place of work is short, which is why he goes there on foot. His work hours are 6:00 a.m. to 11:00 a.m. He needs the loan to buy a calf, with which he will improve his income and will be able to expand production.

Pablo dreams that everything he has worked for will go to his children, for whom he has fought very hard, since his current age does not allow him to work like before anymore.

loans.use: to buy a calf

loans.name: Lorenzo De Jesús

texts.es:
Lorenzo de 44 años de edad,  no estudio pero con el tiempo aprendió a medio leer y dice que también aprendió a poner sus iniciales como firma, actualmente está acompañado,  la esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, ellos son padres de cinco hijos y solo dos de ellos aún viven con ellos, los otros ya tienen hogares aparte y los únicos dos que le han quedado son los que asisten a la escuela. 


Con todo el esfuerzo del mundo dice que él se ha ido dedicando a la agricultura, porque no contó con el apoyo de su familia,  él por sí mismo se ha dedicado a la siembra del maíz y frijol desde que tenía 20años de edad, que fue su madre la que le enseño a cultivar. Lorenzo también hace trabajos cuando alguien lo busca.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar  abono,  insecticidas y en la chapoda del terreno;  ya que  así como esta dice que no se siente capaz de hacerlo solo,  así que un vecino le ayuda pero él le tiene que pagar.  Con este préstamo estará seguro de lo que va a sembrar y que sabe que en el futuro,  él podrá tener su cosecha, y tener seguro el maíz y los frijoles en su casa.

Su deseo es tener una vida tranquila donde pueda descansar, por todo el tiempo que se sacrificó trabajando, espera con la adquisición del crédito el satisfacer su necesidad de mejorar el techo de su casa que está en malas condiciones.
texts.en:
Lorenzo, age 44, did not attend school, but over time he learned to read a little. And, he says that he also learned to write his initials as a signature. He lives with his partner, and she takes care of the household duties. They are the parents of 5 children, but only two still live with them—the others have separate homes now, and the two who have remained are the ones who are attending school. 

He says that he has been dedicating all of his efforts to agriculture, as he did not have help from his family. Also, that he has been growing corn and beans by himself since he was 20 years old, and that it was his mother who taught him to farm. Lorenzo also works when someone asks for him.
 
The loan that he is requesting from CrediCampo is for purchasing fertilizer and insecticide. And, for clearing the land, as he says that he doesn’t feel capable of doing it alone so his neighbor helps, but he has to pay him. With this loan he will be certain of what he will plant, and he knows that in the future he will be able to have his harvest and be sure to have corn and beans in his house.

His desire is to have a tranquil life where he could rest, as he gave up all of the time to working. He hopes that with the loan he can improve the roof of his house which is in bad condition.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and insecticide, and to clear the land in order to plant corn and beans.

loans.name: Delia De Jesús

texts.es:
Delia tiene 38 años de edad, estudió hasta segundo  grado, está casada, su pareja trabaja en la agricultura desde hace 20  años, tiene cuatro hijos.



Ella es ama de casa, pero también se dedica a la agricultura.

El préstamo será invertido en la preparación de la  tierra para la siembra, con el apoyo de sus hijos no invierte en personas que le ayuden, pero si en el arrendamiento de la tierra, la mejora será ir avanzando en los trabajos, y la necesidad satisfecha es poder tener su propio capital de trabajo.



Ella sueña con tener primero lo más necesario para la familia, por lo que espera trabajar siempre mientras Dios le regale salud y vida, el préstamo le ayudara en satisfacer la necesidad del arrendamiento de la tierra.  .
texts.en:
Delia is 38 years old. She studied through second grade. She is married and her partner has been working in agriculture for 20 years. She has four children. She is a homemaker, but she also works in agriculture.

The loan will be invested in preparing the land for planting. With the help of her children, she doesn’t need to pay people to help her.  However, she does need help renting the land. An improvement would be to continue advancing in her work, and having her own working capital would be to have a need fulfilled.

She dreams of having, first and foremost, the necessities for her family. This is why she hopes to work as long as God gives her health and life. The loan will help her to pay for the rent on the land.

loans.use: to prepare the land for planting.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more food such as bitter ball, onion, pepper, maggi cubes, etc. for her business

loans.name: Rut Marina

texts.es:
Rut Marina es una joven de 37 años, soltera, originaria del municipio de El Sauce, que se ha dedicado por más de 10 años a laborar como maestra de primaria.
Vive al lado de su madre quien depende de ella, ya que esta joven no tiene carga familiar por lo que solo le ayuda a su mamá.
Es una persona muy querida en su barrio y en su escuela la cual queda ubicada en una comunidad aledaña a dicho municipio por su carisma y humildad, ya que ella trata de ayudar siempre al más necesitado sobre todo a los niños que son de escasos recursos.
Rut Marina en este momento está necesitando un préstamo para comprar medicamentos y realizarles unos exámenes a su mamá que por su edad ha estado un poco mal de salud y con su salario no alcanza para cubrir estos gastos.
Solicita a los inversionistas de Kiva para que a través de Ceprodel le apoyen con este financiamiento para poder llevar a cabo su inversión donde les quedará eternamente agradecida.
texts.en:
Rut Marina is a young woman of 37 years of age, single and originally from the municipality of El Sauce. She has been a primary school teacher for over 10 years. 

She lives with her mother who depends on her. Since she doesn't have familial responsibilities, she only helps her mother. 

Due to her charisma and humility she is very much loved in her town and in her school which is located in a neighboring community. She always tries to help those most in need specially the children who are poor.

Rut Marina currently needs a loan to buy medicine and to pay for some exams for her mother who due to her age has had poor health. With her salary she doesn't have enough to cover the expenses.

She is asking Kiva’s investors that through Ceprodel they support her with this loan so that she can carry out her investment and she will remain forever grateful.

loans.use: to buy medicine and pay for exams

loans.name: José Salomón

texts.es:
José tiene 57 años de edad, con mucho sacrificio estudió hasta quinto grado, está casado y tiene tres hijos, su esposa es ama de casa.

Él es agricultor, tiene más de 30 años de realizar la actividad, su padre desde pequeño le enseñó a trabajar a ser responsable con lo que hacía, además cuida ganado, tiene tres vacas que ordeña una yunta de bueyes con los que hace los trabajos personales, la distancia que recorre es variable ya que trabaja dos parcelas y no siempre va al mismo lugar, cuando saca la cosecha una parte la vende y lo demás para el consumo, nadie más se involucra en la actividad, el trabajo lo hace por la mañana de 6:00 AM a 12:00 MD.

El préstamo será invertido para comprar los insumos agrícolas  (abonos, herbicidas) el mejoramiento será  tener un capital de trabajo.

El sueño más deseado es poder seguir trabajando, siempre que su estado de salud se lo permita, espera que sus hijos al igual que él sean personas de bien. Con las ganancias que la actividad le produzca, un porcentaje será para el pago de la cuota del préstamo y lo de más en inversión en su casa.
texts.en:
José is 57 years old. Through a lot of sacrifice, he studied through the fifth grade. He is married and has three children. His wife is a homemaker.

He is a farmer. He has been working in this for more than 30 years. From the time he was very young, his father taught him to work and be responsible. He also raises cattle. He has three cows that he milks and a pair of oxen that he uses for his work. The distance he has to go is variable because he works two parcels of land and he doesn’t always go to the same place. When he harvests his crop, he sells part of it and keeps the rest for his own consumption. No helps him with his work. He works from 6:00am until 12:00 noon. 

The loan will be invested in buying agricultural inputs (fertilizers, herbicides). An improvement would be to have his own working capital. 

His dearest dream is to be able to continue working, as long as his health allows. He hopes that his children, like himself, will be successful people. With the earnings that his work produces, a percentage will be for paying the loan and the rest will be for investing in his house.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs (fertilizers, herbicides).

loans.name: Victo

texts.en: Victo lives in Kampala with her husband and two children, both of whom attend school. She also cares for her father, and earns a living by selling secondhand clothing to her neighbors. She has been in this business for the last three years and works seven days a week. Victo is requesting a loan for 300,000 Ugandan shillings to buy a bale of secondhand clothes to sell to her customers. Her business challenges include transportation costs and the seasonal nature of demand for her products. Her goal is to get a permanent location for her business and also to buy a plot of land. She lives in rented house that does not have access to electricity or piped-in water. Her major monthly expenses include rent and school fees.

loans.use: to buy a bale of  secondhand clothes.

loans.name: Hamad

texts.en: Hamad needs this loan to purchase a solar home system for energy to replace his family’s diesel-powered generator and to provide electricity  for their home. Not all Bedouins in Israel have access to the electricity grid, and many depend on diesel-fueled generators for their electricity needs. This loan provides Hamad with access to a solar-powered generator, positively impacting both the borrower's home and the environment.

loans.use: To purchase a solar-powered generator.

loans.name: Mohamed

texts.en:
This is 28-year-old Mohamed. He is married and has 1 child, aged 5 years. Mohamed has 1 additional dependent living with him, for education. In 2002, Mohamed established his phone accessories and drinks business. He began his business because he was unable to further his education due to his father's death. Mohamed joined his friend's business and, because he was hardworking and honest, his friend gave him money to start his own business. 

Mohamed's business is located in the heart of the city and his main customers are the general public. Working 7 days a week and 18 hours a day, he earns about SLL 800,000 monthly from this business. Mohamed would like a loan of SLL 5,000,000 to purchase different types of phone accessories and drinks. In the future, Mohamed plans to complete his building project and to continue educating his children. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more phone accessories and drinks

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more charcoal for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more slippers and other items for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more dried fish for her business.

loans.name: José Ernesto

texts.es:
José tiene 64 años de edad,  estudió hasta sexto grado, está casado y tiene dos hijos, su pareja es ama de casa, ella es la que se encarga de las labores del hogar, sus hijos trabajan y le apoyan en la actividad que el realiza.



Él es agricultor, tiene más de veinte años de realizar la actividad, también tiene una hectárea de platanera, la distancia que recorre para ir a la parcela es de un kilómetro aproximadamente, cuando saca la cosecha lo vende todo y este ingreso es el que le ayuda a sostener el hogar, nadie más se involucra en la actividad, el trabajo lo hace por la mañana de 6:00 AM a 12:00 MD.



El préstamo será invertido en la reparación de los cercos de la parcela, ya que el ganado ajeno se le estaba metiendo y con esta acción resolverá el problema y obtendrá mejores resultados en la cosecha.


El sueño más deseado es poder seguir trabajando, siempre que su estado de salud se lo permita, espera que sus hijos al igual que él sean personas de bien. Con las ganancias que la actividad le produzca, un porcentaje será para el pago de la cuota del préstamo y lo de más en inversión en su casa.
texts.en:
José is 64 years old and studied up to the 6th grade. He is married, has two children, and his wife is a housewife, bearing the responsibility for all of the household chores. His children work and help him with his farm work. He has been doing this for more than 20 years. 

José also has one hectare of banana plants which is about one kilometer from his house. He works from 6 a.m until noon, unaided. When he harvests the crop he sells everything, and this income is what helps to support the household. The loan will be used to invest in repairing the fences surrounding the plot because cattle were getting in. Fixing the fence will solve that problem and will result in a better yielding banana crop.

His greatest desire is to be able to continue working, as long as his health allows, and he hopes that he and his children will be good people. With the money he makes from farming, a percentage will go to repayment of the loan, and he will invest the rest in his house.

loans.use: to repair the fences on his plot of land.

loans.name: José Ramón

texts.es:
José tiene 44 años de edad, estudió hasta sexto grado, está casado y su pareja es la que se encarga de los oficios dementicos y al cuidado de los hijos, sus dos hijos van a la escuela, nadie más vive con ellos por lo que los ingresos son solo para la familia.


Él es albañil y agricultor, es una persona luchadora que tiene el deseo de salir  adelante, el trabajo de albañil lo aprendió cuando era ayudante en las construcciones en las que trabajaba, fijándose aprendió el oficio, también es agricultor, desde pequeño su padre le enseñó a cultivar la tierra y sacar el fruto de ella,  no tiene más actividades a las que se dedique, la distancia que recorre es variada, ya que depende de donde sea el trabajo, por hoy está realzando uno en el mismo pueblo por lo que el recorrido lo hace en bicicleta, el horario de trabajo es de 6 AM a 3 PM.


El préstamo será invertido para comprar insumos para el cultivo, también para el pago del arrendamiento de donde trabajará, la necesidad satisfecha será el dar inicio a la siembra del cultivo del maíz.


Los sueños para su trabajo es que la cosecha se buena, para poder sacar lo que invierte y pagar el préstamo, espera que sus hijos se preparen a pesar de las dificultades que se atraviesan por momentos en las familias.
texts.en:
Jose is 44 years old, and went to school through sixth grade. He is married and his wife takes care of the work at home and of their children.  Their two children go to school; no one else lives with them so their income is only for the use of the family.

He is a bricklayer and a farmer, and is a fighting person who wants to get ahead in life.  Jose learned to work as a bricklayer by  paying attention to the work when he was an assistant at construction jobs.  He is also a farmer; when he was small his father taught him to farm  land and benefit from it.    He has no other occupations.  The distance he travels varies, since it depends on where the work is.  Today he is working in the town where he lives and can make the trip to the work site by bicycle.  The work schedule is from 6AM till 3PM.

The loan will be invested in purchase of farming supplies and also for leasing the land on which Jose will work.  This satisfies the needs to begin sowing a corn crop.    

Juan's dream for his work is that the harvest be a good one so he will be able to get back what he he has invested and pay off the loan. He hopes that his children will prepare themselves well for life in spite of the difficulties that are experienced at times in families.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies

loans.name: Madiha

texts.en:
Madiha is from central Israel and has an organic pesticide business. She has been trained in pesticides with special training in organic and green products. Madiha’s business is successful and as she has made the change to organic and green products she has also increased her outreach and educational information. She is a dedicated professional who also underwent business and microenterprise development training.

She needed this loan to assist in purchasing organic pesticides, green pest control products, educational flyers, sprayers, protective clothing and PR.

Madiha is managing her business well. She wants to expand in the future not just to households and offices but to medical complexes and larger businesses.

loans.use: to assist in purchasing organic pesticides, green pest control products, educational flyers, sprayers, protective clothing and PR costs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more red oil.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more fuel to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more red oil, rice, coal, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more charcoal for her business.

loans.name: Rendah

texts.en:
Rendah is an artisan who specializes in wood sculptures. He is requesting this loan to make a bulk purchase of wood and other materials. He has been selling through NOVICA since 2000, and this is his story: "Balinese woodcarving touches me very deeply. I have learned a variety of arts in Bali, such as gamelan dance, but carving a piece of wood gives me an incomparable sensation. After I finished school, I studied further because I needed more experience, and the tools and materials I needed were beyond my financial reach. Exploring the abstract world refreshes my mind in creating new carvings. I am grateful to all of you who support me with this microcredit. I need this loan to buy the wood and materials needed to prepare new stock. I feel each of you is part of my family and happiness, and I hope you will always be happy." Use the link below to view Rendah's wood sculptures on the NOVICA site:
http://www.novica.com/kiva/878

loans.use: to buy wood and other materials in bulk.

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en:
Elsa is thankful for the financial assistance extended to her as she was able to buy products for her direct selling business. Her previous loan helped her not just in her business but also in the education of her children. The income she earned from her business is assisting their everyday household expenditures. She and her husband are working hard to provide for their everyday needs. She also has a variety store to earn additional income.

She would like to apply for another 10,000 PHP loan for her to buy more merchandise items and products to increase her product inventory. The more items she has on display and available on hand, the better. More items to sell will result in better profits. The profits from her business will definitely help her to sustain her children's education and daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Elsa hopes that her business will continue to flourish and dreams that her family is always in good health. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week, and this is where she also draws strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for additional supplies and merchandise like clothing, footwear, undergarments and cosmetics needed in her business.

loans.name: Renelyn

texts.en:
Renelyn has been running her fish selling business for more than three years and she earns well for the needs of her child. As a single mom, she solely provides for the needs of her child by selling seafood in their village. 

Currently, Renelyn has taken a new loan from GDMPC micro credit to buy additional fish and seaweed to sell. She wants to make an expansion to her business and dreams of seeing her child's success in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional fish and seaweed to sell

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.en:
Lourdes is 50 years old and married with two children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo and groceries.

Lourdes has borrowed and paid 7 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 1 year and also earns an income from food vending.

She aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell in her general store

loans.name: Sheila

texts.en:
Sheila is 48 years old and married with one child. She works very hard to provide for them.

Sheila runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks to sell like canned goods, egg, milk, and sugar.

Sheila has been in this business for 2 years. 

In the future Sheila would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks to sell in her general store

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda is 48 years old, married, and has three children, two of whom are in school.

She is in the agricultural pig fattening business in the Philippines. Imelda requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Imelda has been pig fattening for 6 years now, and has borrowed 12 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Encarnacion

texts.en:
As a married parent of one children, Encarnacion works hard to support her family.

She has a buy and sell dried fish business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from selling vegetables.  Encarnacion is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of dried fish to sell.

Encarnacion has been sustaining her business activities through her past 22 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of dried fish to sell
